attachments.value:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" data-theme="dark"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1">
<title>Agent Marketplace</title>
<style>
  :root{
    /* Material Design 2 Color System - Dark Theme */
    --primary: #1976D2; /* colors.blue.darken1 */
    --secondary: #FF9800; /* colors.orange.darken1 */
    --error: #F44336;
    --warning: #FF5722;
    --info: #03a9f4;
    --success: #4CAF50;
    --cfx3rdlevel: #313946;
    --cfxcard: #282F3A;
    --cfxbackground: #161B21;
    --cfxreportheader: #1565C0; /* colors.blue.darken4 */
    --cfxtabtext: #E0E0E0; /* colors.grey.lighten2 */
    --cfxtext: #FAFAFA; /* colors.grey.lighten4 */
    --cfxgrey: #282F3A;
    --cfxlinkhover: #0D47A1; /* colors.blue.darken3 */
    
    /* Derived colors */
    --bg: var(--cfxbackground);
    --bg-secondary: var(--cfxcard);
    --card: var(--cfxcard);
    --text: var(--cfxtext);
    --text-secondary: var(--cfxtabtext);
    --text-muted: #9E9E9E;
    --border: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    --accent: var(--primary);
    --accent-hover: var(--cfxlinkhover);
    --accent-light: rgba(144,202,249,.12);
    --accent-border: rgba(144,202,249,.24);
    --green: var(--success);
    --red: var(--error);
    --shadow: rgba(0,0,0,.3);
    
    /* Material Design 2 Elevation */
    --elevation-0: 0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0);
    --elevation-1: 0px 2px 1px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-2: 0px 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 2px 2px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-3: 0px 3px 3px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 3px 4px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 8px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-4: 0px 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 4px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-6: 0px 3px 5px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 6px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 18px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-8: 0px 5px 5px -3px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 8px 10px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 3px 14px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-12: 0px 7px 8px -4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 12px 17px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 5px 22px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-16: 0px 8px 10px -5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 16px 24px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 6px 30px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-24: 0px 11px 15px -7px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 24px 38px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 9px 46px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
  }

  [data-theme="light"]{
    /* Material Design 2 Color System - Light Theme */
    --primary: #1976D2; /* colors.blue.darken1 */
    --secondary: #FF9800; /* colors.orange.base */
    --error: #D32F2F; /* colors.red.darken1 */
    --warning: #FF5722;
    --info: #03a9f4;
    --success: #4CAF50;
    --cfx3rdlevel: #F7F7F7;
    --cfxcard: #FFFFFF;
    --cfxbackground: #f9f9f9;
    --cfxreportheader: #E3F2FD; /* colors.blue.lighten5 */
    --cfxtabtext: #424242; /* colors.grey.darken1 */
    --cfxtext: #212121; /* colors.grey.darken4 */
    --cfxgrey: #757575; /* colors.grey.base */
    --cfxlinkhover: #0D47A1; /* colors.blue.darken3 */
    
    /* Derived colors */
    --bg: var(--cfxbackground);
    --bg-secondary: var(--cfxcard);
    --card: var(--cfxcard);
    --text: var(--cfxtext);
    --text-secondary: var(--cfxtabtext);
    --text-muted: var(--cfxgrey);
    --border: #E0E0E0;
    --accent: var(--primary);
    --accent-hover: var(--cfxlinkhover);
    --accent-light: rgba(25,118,210,.08);
    --accent-border: rgba(25,118,210,.24);
    --green: var(--success);
    --red: var(--error);
    --shadow: rgba(0,0,0,.12);
    
    /* Light theme elevation adjustments */
    --elevation-0: 0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0);
    --elevation-1: 0px 2px 1px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-2: 0px 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 2px 2px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-3: 0px 3px 3px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 3px 4px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 8px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-4: 0px 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 4px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-6: 0px 3px 5px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 6px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 1px 18px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-8: 0px 5px 5px -3px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 8px 10px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 3px 14px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-12: 0px 7px 8px -4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 12px 17px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 5px 22px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-16: 0px 8px 10px -5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 16px 24px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 6px 30px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --elevation-24: 0px 11px 15px -7px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0px 24px 38px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0px 9px 46px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
  }

  *{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}
  html,body{height:100%;overflow:hidden;width:100%}
  body{
    background:var(--bg);
    color:var(--text);
    font-family: "Avenir", "Avenir Next", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    font-weight: 400;
    letter-spacing: 0.00938em;
    -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;
    transition:background .3s ease, color .3s ease;
  }

  /* Material Design 2 Typography Scale */
  .text-h1 { font-size: 6rem; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.167; letter-spacing: -0.01562em; }
  .text-h2 { font-size: 3.75rem; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.2; letter-spacing: -0.00833em; }
  .text-h3 { font-size: 3rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.167; letter-spacing: 0em; }
  .text-h4 { font-size: 2.125rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.235; letter-spacing: 0.00735em; }
  .text-h5 { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.334; letter-spacing: 0em; }
  .text-h6 { font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.6; letter-spacing: 0.0075em; }
  .text-subtitle1 { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.75; letter-spacing: 0.00938em; }
  .text-subtitle2 { font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.57; letter-spacing: 0.00714em; }
  .text-body1 { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 0.00938em; }
  .text-body2 { font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.43; letter-spacing: 0.01071em; }
  .text-button { font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.75; letter-spacing: 0.02857em; text-transform: uppercase; }
  .text-caption { font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.66; letter-spacing: 0.03333em; }
  .text-overline { font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 2.66; letter-spacing: 0.08333em; text-transform: uppercase; }

  .container{
    display:flex;
    height:100vh;
    position:relative;
    min-height:100vh;
    flex-direction:column;
  }

  .main-content{
    flex:1;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    overflow:hidden;
    transition:margin-right .3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    width:100%;
  }

  .main-content.pane-open{
    margin-right:520px;
  }

  .top-bar{
    padding: 0 16px;
    background: var(--card);
    color: var(--text);
    display: flex;
    gap: 16px;
    align-items: center;
    box-shadow: var(--elevation-4);
    position: relative;
    z-index: 50;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    min-height: 64px;
    height: 64px;
  }

  .search-wrapper{
    position:relative;
    flex:1;
    max-width:600px;
    min-width:200px;
  }

  .search-icon{
    position:absolute;
    left:16px;
    top:50%;
    transform:translateY(-50%);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    pointer-events:none;
  }

  .search-input{
    width:100%;
    padding: 8px 16px 8px 48px;
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: 4px;
    color: var(--text);
    font-size: 16px;
    font-family: inherit;
    outline: none;
    transition: all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  }

  .search-input::placeholder{
    color: var(--text-muted);
  }

  .search-input:focus{
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-color: var(--primary);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(25,118,210,0.2);
  }

  .top-bar-actions{
    display:flex;
    gap:12px;
    align-items:center;
    margin-left:auto;
    flex-wrap:wrap;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .theme-toggle{
    display: none;
  }

  .theme-toggle svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
  }

  .sort-select{
    padding: 8px 32px 8px 16px;
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: 4px;
    color: var(--text);
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: inherit;
    outline: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    appearance: none;
    transition: all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width: 180px;
    background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="%239E9E9E" stroke-width="2"><path d="m6 9 6 6 6-6"/></svg>');
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: right 12px center;
  }

  .sort-select:hover, .sort-select:focus{
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-color: var(--primary);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(25,118,210,0.2);
  }

  .sort-select:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .sort-select option{
    background:var(--card);
    color:var(--text);
  }

  .sections-container{
    flex:1;
    overflow-y:auto;
    overflow-x:hidden;
    padding:28px 32px;
  }

  .search-results-container{
    display:none;
  }

  .search-results-container.active{
    display:block;
  }

  .sections-container.search-active .category-section{
    display:none;
  }

  .search-results-grid{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:32px;
  }

  .search-category-group{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:16px;
  }

  .search-category-header{
    font-size:clamp(14px, 2.2vw, 16px);
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--text);
    padding:12px 0;
    border-bottom:2px solid var(--accent);
    letter-spacing:.3px;
  }

  .search-category-tiles{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(340px,1fr));
    gap:20px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for search category tiles */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .search-category-tiles{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:20px;
    }
    .search-category-tiles .card{
      flex:1 1 340px;
      max-width:calc(50% - 10px);
    }
  }

  .search-header{
    margin-bottom:24px;
    padding-bottom:16px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .search-header h2{
    font-size:clamp(16px, 2.5vw, 18px);
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:700;
  }

  .search-header .count{
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:clamp(12px, 1.8vw, 14px);
    margin-top:6px;
  }

  .category-section{
    margin-bottom:28px;
    overflow:visible;
  }

  .section-header{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    justify-content:space-between;
    padding:16px 20px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    user-select:none;
    margin-bottom:16px;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    min-height:44px;
  }

  .section-header:hover{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .section-header:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .section-title{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .section-title h2{
    font-size:clamp(14px, 2.2vw, 16px);
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--text);
  }

  .section-count{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    padding:4px 10px;
    border-radius:12px;
    font-size:clamp(10px, 1.5vw, 12px);
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--accent);
    border:1px solid var(--accent-border);
  }

  .toggle-icon{
    transition:transform .3s;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:18px;
  }

  .section-header.collapsed .toggle-icon{
    transform:rotate(-90deg);
  }

  .section-grid{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(340px,1fr));
    gap:20px;
    max-height:2000px;
    overflow:visible;
    transition:max-height .3s ease, opacity .3s ease;
    opacity:1;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for older browsers */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .section-grid{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:20px;
    }
    .section-grid .card{
      flex:1 1 340px;
      max-width:calc(50% - 10px);
    }
  }

  .section-grid.collapsed{
    max-height:0;
    opacity:0;
  }

  .card{
    position:relative;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:20px;
    padding:16px;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    cursor:pointer;
    overflow:visible;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    min-height:200px;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    width:100%;
    max-width:100%;
  }
  
  .card:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-8);
    transform:translateY(-2px);
  }

  .card:active{
    transform:translateY(0);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .card:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .card.hidden{display:none}

  .fav{
    position:absolute;
    top:8px;
    right:8px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:50%;
    padding:8px;
    cursor:pointer;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    z-index:10;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
  }
  
  .fav:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .fav:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }
  
  .fav svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
    fill:none;
    stroke:currentColor;
    stroke-width:2.5;
    transition:all .2s;
  }
  
  .fav.active{
    color:var(--primary);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }
  
  .fav.active svg{
    fill:var(--primary);
    stroke:var(--primary);
  }

  .head{
    display:flex;
    align-items:flex-start;
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:16px;
    padding-right:40px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .icon-wrap{
    width:48px;
    height:48px;
    border-radius:4px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .icon-wrap svg{
    width:24px;
    height:24px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    stroke-width:2;
    stroke-linecap:round;
    stroke-linejoin:round;
    fill:none;
  }

  .title-area{
    min-width:0;
    flex:1;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .name{
    font-size:clamp(14px, 2.2vw, 16px);
    font-weight:600;
    margin:0 0 6px;
    color:var(--text);
    line-height:1.4;
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .badge{
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:12px;
    padding:4px 8px;
    border-radius:16px;
    color:white;
    background:#6200EE;
    font-weight:500;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
  }

  .meta{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-top:auto;
    padding-top:16px;
    border-top:1px solid var(--border);
    font-size:clamp(10px, 1.6vw, 12px);
    flex-shrink:0;
    min-width:0;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for meta grid */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .meta{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .meta .kv{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:120px;
    }
    .meta .state-indicator{
      flex:1 1 100%;
    }
  }

  .kv{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:4px;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .kv.desc{ grid-column:1/-1 }

  .k{
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-size:clamp(8px, 1.2vw, 10px);
    font-weight:600;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
  }

  .v{
    color:var(--text);
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .v.desc-truncate{ overflow:hidden; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap }

  .state-indicator{
    grid-column:1/-1;
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:8px;
    padding:8px 12px;
    background:var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-radius:4px;
    font-size:12px;
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .dot{
    width:6px;
    height:6px;
    border-radius:50%;
    background:var(--green);
  }

  .state-indicator.disabled{
    color:var(--red);
  }

  .state-indicator.disabled .dot{
    background:var(--red);
  }

  .state-indicator:not(.disabled){
    color:var(--green);
  }

  .empty-section{
    text-align:center;
    padding:40px 20px;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
  }

  .side-pane{
    position:fixed;
    top:0;
    right:-520px;
    width:520px;
    max-width:100vw;
    height:100vh;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-16);
    overflow-y:auto;
    transition:right .3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    z-index:100;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .side-pane.open{
    right:0;
  }

  .pane-header{
    position:sticky;
    top:0;
    background:var(--card);
    padding:24px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
    display:flex;
    align-items:flex-start;
    gap:16px;
    z-index:10;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    flex-shrink:0;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .close-btn{
    background:transparent;
    border:none;
    border-radius:50%;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    cursor:pointer;
    padding:8px;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    margin-left:auto;
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
  }

  .close-btn:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .close-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .close-btn svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
  }

  .pane-content{
    padding:24px;
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow-y:auto;
  }

  .detail-section{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .detail-title{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    font-weight:700;
    letter-spacing:1px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:12px;
  }

  .detail-value{
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    line-height:1.6;
  }

  .detail-grid{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for detail grid */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .detail-grid{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .detail-grid .detail-item{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:200px;
    }
  }

  .detail-item{
    background:var(--card);
    padding:16px;
    border-radius:4px;
    border:none;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .detail-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .detail-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .detail-item-label{
    font-size:clamp(8px, 1.2vw, 10px);
    font-weight:600;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:6px;
  }

  .detail-item-value{
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:600;
  }

  .pane-icon{
    width:64px;
    height:64px;
    border-radius:4px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .pane-icon svg{
    width:32px;
    height:32px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    stroke-width:2;
    stroke-linecap:round;
    stroke-linejoin:round;
    fill:none;
  }

  .pane-title-area{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .pane-title-area h2{
    font-size:clamp(16px, 2.8vw, 20px);
    margin:0 0 10px;
    line-height:1.3;
    color:var(--text);
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .pane-tags{
    display:flex;
    flex-wrap:wrap;
    gap:6px;
    margin-top:0;
  }

  .pane-tag{
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:12px;
    padding:4px 8px;
    border-radius:16px;
    background:#6200EE;
    color:white;
    font-weight:500;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
  }

  .action-buttons{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:32px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for action buttons */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .action-buttons{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .action-buttons .action-btn{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:150px;
    }
  }

  .action-btn{
    padding:12px 24px;
    background:var(--primary);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    color:white;
    font-size:14px;
    font-weight:500;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    text-align:center;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    min-height:44px;
  }

  .action-btn:hover{
    background:var(--cfxlinkhover);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .action-btn:active{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .action-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .tabs-wrapper{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tabs-nav-container{
    position:relative;
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tabs-nav{
    display:flex;
    gap:8px;
    overflow:hidden;
    padding-bottom:12px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
    position:relative;
  }

  .tabs-scroll{
    display:flex;
    gap:8px;
    transition:transform .3s ease;
    flex-wrap:nowrap;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .tab-btn{
    padding:12px 16px;
    background:transparent;
    border:none;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:14px;
    font-weight:500;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    white-space:nowrap;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    border-radius:4px;
    position:relative;
    flex-shrink:0;
    min-width:0;
    min-height:44px;
  }

  .tab-btn:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .tab-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .tab-btn.active{
    color:var(--primary);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .tab-btn.active::after{
    content:'';
    position:absolute;
    bottom:0;
    left:0;
    right:0;
    height:2px;
    background:var(--primary);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn{
    position:absolute;
    top:50%;
    transform:translateY(-50%);
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    border-radius:50%;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    z-index:5;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn:hover{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    color:var(--primary);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.left{
    left:-8px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.right{
    right:-8px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.hidden{
    display:none;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn svg{
    width:16px;
    height:16px;
  }

  .tab-content{
    display:none;
    animation:fadeIn .3s ease;
  }

  .tab-content.active{
    display:block;
  }

  @keyframes fadeIn{
    from{opacity:0;transform:translateY(8px)}
    to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}
  }

  .tab-section{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tab-section-title{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    font-weight:700;
    letter-spacing:1px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:12px;
    padding-bottom:8px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .tab-section-content{
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
    line-height:1.6;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .tab-section-content ul{
    list-style:none;
    padding:0;
  }

  .tab-section-content li{
    padding:6px 0;
    padding-left:18px;
    position:relative;
  }

  .tab-section-content li:before{
    content:'•';
    position:absolute;
    left:0;
    color:var(--accent);
    font-weight:bold;
  }

  .contact-grid{
    display:grid;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .contact-item{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .contact-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .contact-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .contact-icon{
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-radius:4px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .contact-icon svg{
    width:18px;
    height:18px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:2;
  }

  .contact-details{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .contact-label{
    font-size:clamp(8px, 1.2vw, 10px);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:600;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    margin-bottom:4px;
  }

  .contact-value{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:500;
    word-break:break-all;
  }

  .image-gallery{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap:12px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for image gallery */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .image-gallery{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery .gallery-item{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:150px;
    }
  }

  .gallery-item{
    aspect-ratio:16/9;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    overflow:hidden;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
  }

  .gallery-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-8);
    transform:scale(1.02);
  }

  .gallery-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .gallery-placeholder{
    color:var(--text-muted);
  }

  .gallery-placeholder svg{
    width:32px;
    height:32px;
    stroke:currentColor;
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:1.5;
  }

  .video-list{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .video-item{
    display:flex;
    gap:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .video-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .video-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .video-thumb{
    width:100px;
    height:60px;
    background:var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-radius:4px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .video-thumb svg{
    width:24px;
    height:24px;
    fill:var(--accent);
  }

  .video-info{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .video-title{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:4px;
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .video-duration{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .document-list{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:10px;
  }

  .document-item{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .document-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .document-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .document-icon{
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-radius:4px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .document-icon svg{
    width:18px;
    height:18px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:2;
  }

  .document-info{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .document-name{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:2px;
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .document-meta{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:500;
  }
  
  a{ color:var(--accent); text-decoration:none }
  a:hover{ color:var(--accent-hover) }

  .troubleshooting-item{
    margin-bottom:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border-left:4px solid var(--primary);
    border-radius:4px;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .troubleshooting-question{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:8px;
  }

  .troubleshooting-answer{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    line-height:1.6;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .backdrop{
    position:fixed;
    top:0;
    left:0;
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    background:transparent;
    opacity:0;
    pointer-events:none;
    transition:opacity 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    z-index:99;
  }

  .backdrop.active{
    opacity:1;
    pointer-events:all;
  }

  /* Extra Large Screens (1600px+) */
  @media (min-width: 1601px){
    .section-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(380px,1fr))}
    .search-category-tiles{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(380px,1fr))}
    .container{
      max-width:1800px;
      margin:0 auto;
    }
  }

  /* Large Screens (1201px - 1600px) */
  @media (min-width: 1201px) and (max-width: 1600px){
    .backdrop{
      display:none;
    }
    .section-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(320px,1fr))}
    .search-category-tiles{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(320px,1fr))}
  }

  /* Desktop Screens (1025px - 1200px) */
  @media (min-width: 1025px) and (max-width: 1200px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:520px;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .section-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(300px,1fr))}
    .search-category-tiles{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(300px,1fr))}
  }

  /* Tablet Landscape (769px - 1024px) */
  @media (min-width: 769px) and (max-width: 1024px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:520px;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .top-bar{
      padding: 0 16px;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .search-wrapper{
      max-width:400px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:24px 20px;
    }
    .section-grid, .search-category-tiles{
      grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(280px,1fr));
      gap:16px;
    }
    .card{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .section-header{
      padding:16px 18px;
    }
    .action-buttons{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .detail-grid{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:20px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:20px;
    }
  }

  /* Tablet Portrait (481px - 768px) */
  @media (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 768px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:520px;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .top-bar{
      flex-direction:column;
      align-items:stretch;
      padding: 0 16px;
      gap:12px;
      height:auto;
      min-height:64px;
    }
    .search-wrapper{
      max-width:100%;
    }
    .top-bar-actions{
      margin-left:0;
      justify-content:space-between;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
    }
    .sort-select{
      flex:1;
      min-width:150px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:20px 16px;
    }
    .section-grid, .search-category-tiles{
      grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(250px,1fr));
      gap:16px;
    }
    .card{
      padding:16px;
      min-height:180px;
    }
    .section-header{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .action-buttons{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .detail-grid{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:16px;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .pane-icon{
      width:56px;
      height:56px;
    }
    .pane-icon svg{
      width:28px;
      height:28px;
    }
    .pane-title-area h2{
      font-size:18px;
    }
    .tab-btn{
      padding:12px 16px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
  }

  /* Mobile Landscape (481px - 600px) */
  @media (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 600px){
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:100%;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:16px;
    }
  }

  /* Mobile Portrait (320px - 480px) */
  @media (max-width: 480px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:100%;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .top-bar{
      padding: 0 12px;
      gap:8px;
      height:auto;
      min-height:56px;
    }
    .search-wrapper{
      max-width:100%;
    }
    .top-bar-actions{
      margin-left:0;
      justify-content:space-between;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:8px;
    }
    .sort-select{
      flex:1;
      min-width:120px;
      font-size:14px;
    }
    .theme-toggle{
      width:40px;
      height:40px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:16px 12px;
    }
    .section-grid, .search-category-tiles{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .card{
      padding:16px;
      min-height:160px;
    }
    .section-header{
      padding:12px 16px;
    }
    .section-title h2{
      font-size:14px;
    }
    .section-count{
      font-size:11px;
      padding:4px 8px;
    }
    .head{
      gap:12px;
      margin-bottom:12px;
      padding-right:40px;
    }
    .icon-wrap{
      width:40px;
      height:40px;
    }
    .icon-wrap svg{
      width:20px;
      height:20px;
    }
    .name{
      font-size:14px;
    }
    .badge{
      font-size:10px;
      padding:4px 8px;
    }
    .meta{
      gap:12px;
      padding-top:12px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .action-buttons{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:8px;
    }
    .action-btn{
      padding:12px 16px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .detail-grid{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:12px;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:12px;
    }
    .pane-icon{
      width:48px;
      height:48px;
    }
    .pane-icon svg{
      width:24px;
      height:24px;
    }
    .pane-title-area h2{
      font-size:16px;
    }
    .pane-tag{
      font-size:10px;
      padding:4px 8px;
    }
    .tab-btn{
      padding:12px 16px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .tab-nav-btn{
      width:32px;
      height:32px;
    }
    .tab-nav-btn svg{
      width:16px;
      height:16px;
    }
    .contact-item, .document-item, .video-item{
      padding:12px;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .contact-icon, .document-icon{
      width:36px;
      height:36px;
    }
    .contact-icon svg, .document-icon svg{
      width:18px;
      height:18px;
    }
    .video-thumb{
      width:80px;
      height:48px;
    }
    .video-thumb svg{
      width:20px;
      height:20px;
    }
    .video-title{
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .video-duration{
      font-size:10px;
    }
    .document-name{
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .document-meta{
      font-size:10px;
    }
    .contact-label{
      font-size:9px;
    }
    .contact-value{
      font-size:12px;
    }
  }

  /* Extra Small Mobile (max-width: 320px) */
  @media (max-width: 320px){
    .top-bar{
      padding: 0 8px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:12px 8px;
    }
    .card{
      padding:12px;
      min-height:140px;

  ::-webkit-scrollbar{width:8px;height:8px}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:var(--bg)}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:var(--border);border-radius:4px}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:var(--text-muted)}

  .gallery-item img{width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;display:block}

  .show-all-toggle{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:8px;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:14px;
    user-select:none;

  /* === Image Modal (Lightbox) === */

}
/* === Agent Icon Styling === */

            </svg>

<script>
  const icons = {
    bot: '<path d="M12 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 2c0 .74-.4 1.39-1 1.73V7h1a7 7 0 0 1 7 7h1a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v3a1 1 0 0 1-1 1h-1a7 7 0 0 1-7 7H9a7 7 0 0 1-7-7H1a1 1 0 0 1-1-1v-3a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h1a7 7 0 0 1 7-7h1V5.73c-.6-.34-1-.99-1-1.73a2 2 0 0 1 2-2z"/><circle cx="9" cy="13" r="1"/><circle cx="15" cy="13" r="1"/>',

    puzzle: '<path d="M19.439 15.439v4.122A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 18 21H4a2 2 0 0 1-2-2v-6.439A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 3.439 11H6a2 2 0 0 0 0-4H3.439A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 2 5.561V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v1.561A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 18.561 7H16a2 2 0 0 0 0 4h2.561a1.439 1.439 0 0 1 .878 2.439z"/>',
    tool: '<path d="M14.7 6.3a1 1 0 0 0 0 1.4l1.6 1.6a1 1 0 0 0 1.4 0l3.77-3.77a6 6 0 0 1-7.94 7.94l-6.91 6.91a2.12 2.12 0 0 1-3-3l6.91-6.91a6 6 0 0 1 7.94-7.94l-3.76 3.76z"/>',
    box: '<path d="M21 16V8a2 2 0 0 0-1-1.73l-7-4a2 2 0 0 0-2 0l-7 4A2 2 0 0 0 3 8v8a2 2 0 0 0 1 1.73l7 4a2 2 0 0 0 2 0l7-4A2 2 0 0 0 21 16z"/><polyline points="3.27 6.96 12 12.01 20.73 6.96"/><line x1="12" y1="22.08" x2="12" y2="12"/>' ,
    pen: '<path d="M17 3a2.83 2.83 0 1 1 4 4L7.5 20.5 2 22l1.5-5.5L17 3z"/>',
    globe: '<circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"/><line x1="2" y1="12" x2="22" y2="12"/><path d="M12 2a15.3 15.3 0 0 1 4 10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1-4 10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1-4-10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1 4-10z"/>',
    toolbox: '<path d="M5 4h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v5a1 1 0 0 1-1 1H4a1 1 0 0 1-1-1V6a2 2 0 0 1 2-2z"/><path d="M3 12h18v7a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2v-7z"/><path d="M10 6V4a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h2a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v2"/>',
    user: '<path d="M20 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H8a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2"/><circle cx="12" cy="7" r="4"/>',
    satellite: '<path d="M13 7 9 3 5 7l4 4 4-4z"/><path d="m17 11 4 4-4 4-4-4 4-4z"/><path d="m8 12 4 4 6-6-4-4-6 6z"/><path d="M3 21a9 9 0 0 0 9-9"/>',
    chart: '<line x1="18" y1="20" x2="18" y2="10"/><line x1="12" y1="20" x2="12" y2="4"/><line x1="6" y1="20" x2="6" y2="14"/>',
    shield: '<path d="M12 22s8-4 8-10V5l-8-3-8 3v7c0 6 8 10 8 10z"/>'
  };

  let agents = [];
  let categoryMap = {};

  async function loadData(){
    try{
      const [agentsRes, categoriesRes] = await Promise.all([
        fetch("/swagger/static/agent_catalogue/agents_2.json"),
        fetch("categories.json")
      ]);
      if(!agentsRes.ok || !categoriesRes.ok){
        throw new Error('Failed to load data files');
      }
      agents = await agentsRes.json();
      categoryMap = await categoriesRes.json();
      renderAll();
    } catch(err){
      console.error('Data load error:', err);
      const container = document.getElementById('sectionsContainer');
      if(container){
        container.innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">Failed to load data. Please verify files in data/.</div>';
      }
    }
  }

  const favKey = 'agentFavs';
  const themeKey = 'agentTheme';
  const favSet = new Set(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(favKey) || '[]'));
  const $ = (sel, el=document)=>el.querySelector(sel);
  const $$ = (sel, el=document)=>el.querySelectorAll(sel);

  let searchQuery = '';
  let sortBy = 'name';
  let activeTab = 'documents';
  let tabScrollPosition = 0;
  let showAllAgents = false; // false => show Enabled only; true => show both

  // Theme toggle
  const themeToggle = $('#themeToggle');
  const sunIcon = $('.sun-icon');
  const moonIcon = $('.moon-icon');
  
  const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || 'dark';
  if(savedTheme === 'light'){
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', 'light');
    sunIcon.style.display = 'none';
    moonIcon.style.display = 'block';
  }

  themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
    const currentTheme = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
    const newTheme = currentTheme === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light';
    
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', newTheme);
    localStorage.setItem(themeKey, newTheme);
    
    if(newTheme === 'light'){
      sunIcon.style.display = 'none';
      moonIcon.style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      sunIcon.style.display = 'block';
      moonIcon.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });

  // Adopt light/dark mode from top-level app automatically
  (function setupParentThemeSync(){
    const htmlEl = document.documentElement;
    const applyTheme = (mode) => {
      const t = mode === 'light' ? 'light' : 'dark';
      htmlEl.setAttribute('data-theme', t);
    };

    function tryParentDomTheme(){
      try{
        if(window.top && window.top !== window && window.top.document){
          const t = window.top.document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
          if(t === 'light' || t === 'dark'){
            applyTheme(t);
            return true;
          }
        }
      }catch(e){ /* cross-origin */ }
      return false;
    }

    window.addEventListener('message', (ev) => {
      const d = ev && ev.data;
      if(!d) return;
      const t = (d.theme || (d.payload && d.payload.theme) || '').toLowerCase();
      if(d.type === 'THEME_CHANGE' || d.type === 'SET_THEME'){
        if(t === 'light' || t === 'dark') applyTheme(t);
      }
    });

    if(!tryParentDomTheme()){
      // Request theme from parent if embedded
      try{ if(window.top && window.top !== window){ window.top.postMessage({ type:'REQUEST_THEME', from:'agent_catalogue' }, '*'); } }catch(e){}
      // Fallback to system preference
      const mq = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
      if(mq){
        applyTheme(mq.matches ? 'dark' : 'light');
        if(mq.addEventListener){
          mq.addEventListener('change', (ev) => applyTheme(ev.matches ? 'dark' : 'light'));
        }
      }
    }
  })();

  function favButton(id){
    const btn = document.createElement('button');
    btn.className = 'fav' + (favSet.has(id) ? ' active' : '');
    btn.innerHTML = '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M12 17.3l-6.2 3.3 1.2-6.9L1 8.9l6.9-1 3.1-6.3 3.1 6.3 6.9 1-5 4.8 1.2 6.9z"/></svg>';
    btn.addEventListener('click', (e)=>{
      e.stopPropagation();
      if(favSet.has(id)){
        favSet.delete(id);
        btn.classList.remove('active');
      } else {
        favSet.add(id);
        btn.classList.add('active');
      }
      localStorage.setItem(favKey, JSON.stringify([...favSet]));
      renderAll();
    });
    return btn;
  }

  function tile(agent){
    const card = document.createElement('div');
    card.className = 'card tile';
    card.dataset.id = agent.id;
    card.dataset.name = agent.name.toLowerCase();
    card.dataset.category = agent.category;

    card.appendChild(favButton(agent.id));

    const head = document.createElement('div');
    head.className = 'head';
    head.innerHTML = `
      <div class="icon-wrap"
     style="width:48px;height:48px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;border-radius:8px;overflow:hidden;background-color:#fff;">
  <img 
    src="${agent.icon && !agent.icon.startsWith('http') 
      ? agent.icon 
      : '/swagger/static/agent_catalogue/icons/' + (agent.id || 'ai_observability_agent') + '.png'}"
    onerror="this.src='/swagger/static/agent_catalogue/icons/ai_observability_agent.png';"
    alt="${agent.name}"
    style="width:90%;height:90%;object-fit:contain;display:block;"
  >
</div>
      <div class="title-area">
        <h3 class="name">${agent.name}</h3>
        <span class="badge">${agent.category}</span>
      </div>
    `;

    card.appendChild(head);

    const meta = document.createElement('div');
    meta.className = 'meta';
    meta.innerHTML = `
      <div class="kv"><div class="k">Version</div><div class="v">${agent.version}</div></div>
      <div class="kv"><div class="k">Publisher</div><div class="v">${agent.publisher}</div></div>
      <div class="kv desc"><div class="k">Description</div><div class="v desc-truncate">${(agent.description || '').replace(/</g,'<').replace(/>/g,'>')}</div></div>
      <div class="state-indicator ${agent.state === 'Disabled' ? 'disabled' : ''}">
        <span class="dot"></span>${agent.state}
      </div>
    `;
    card.appendChild(meta);

    card.addEventListener('click', () => openPane(agent));

    return card;
  }

  function updateTabNavigation(){
    const container = document.querySelector('.tabs-nav-container');
    if(!container) return;
    
    const scroll = container.querySelector('.tabs-scroll');
    const leftBtn = container.querySelector('.tab-nav-btn.left');
    const rightBtn = container.querySelector('.tab-nav-btn.right');
    
    if(!scroll || !leftBtn || !rightBtn) return;
    
    const maxScroll = scroll.scrollWidth - scroll.parentElement.clientWidth;
    
    leftBtn.classList.toggle('hidden', tabScrollPosition <= 0);
    rightBtn.classList.toggle('hidden', tabScrollPosition >= maxScroll);
  }

  function scrollTabs(direction){
    const container = document.querySelector('.tabs-nav-container');
    if(!container) return;
    
    const scroll = container.querySelector('.tabs-scroll');
    if(!scroll) return;
    
    const scrollAmount = 200;
    const maxScroll = scroll.scrollWidth - scroll.parentElement.clientWidth;
    
    if(direction === 'left'){
      tabScrollPosition = Math.max(0, tabScrollPosition - scrollAmount);
    } else {
      tabScrollPosition = Math.min(maxScroll, tabScrollPosition + scrollAmount);
    }
    
    scroll.style.transform = `translateX(-${tabScrollPosition}px)`;
    updateTabNavigation();
  }

  function switchTab(tabName){
    activeTab = tabName;
    
    $$('.tab-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.classList.toggle('active', btn.dataset.tab === tabName);
    });
    
    $$('.tab-content').forEach(content => {
      content.classList.toggle('active', content.dataset.tab === tabName);
    });
  }
  
  function launchfabaio(agent) {
    const today = new Date();
    const day = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
    const month = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); // Month is 0-indexed
    const year = today.getFullYear();
    const formattedDate = `${month}/${day}/${year}`;
   
    const cfxAction = {
      "type": "GO_TO_APP_STATE", 
      "label": "Fabaio", 
      "appName": "user-dashboard/fabrix.ai-copilot", 
      "pageName": "user-dashboard-fabrix.ai-copilot", 
      "contexts": {
        "persona_fq_name":`${agent.ai_project_name}/${agent.ai_persona}`,
        "agent": {
        }
      }, 
      "postLaunchParams": {
        "startConversation": {
          "title": `${agent.ai_persona} ${formattedDate}`,
          "persona_fq_name":`${agent.ai_project_name}/${agent.ai_persona}`,
          "persona": agent.ai_persona,
          "llm": "claude-sonnet-4"
        }
      } 
    };
    window.top.postMessage(cfxAction);
  }

  function launchfabaioOriginal(agent) {
    console.log("Launching Copilor with agent persona")
    console.log(agent);
    const cfxAction = {
      type: "GO_TO_APP_STATE",
      label: "Fabaio",
      appName: "user-dashboard/fabrix.ai-copilot",
      pageName: "user-dashboard-fabrix.ai-copilot",
      contexts: { agent }
    };
    window.top.postMessage(cfxAction);
  }

  function launchAIPersonaObserveDashboard(agent) {
    const cfxAction = {
      type: "GO_TO_APP_STATE",
      label: "Fabaio",
      appName: "user-dashboard/ai_administration_observe",
      pageName: "user-dashboard-ai_catalog_chat_sessions",
      contexts: { 
        persona: agent.ai_persona,
        ai_project_name: agent.ai_project_name
      }
    };
    window.top.postMessage(cfxAction);
  }

  function launchAgenticWorkflows(agent) {
    // Use personaName if available, fallback to ai_persona, then Lab Admin
    const personaName = agent.ai_persona || "Lab Admin";
    const aiProjectName = agent.ai_project_name || "Staging";
    const flowType = agent.flow_type || "agent";

    const cfxAction = {
      type: "GO_TO_APP_STATE",
      label: "Agentic Workflows",
      appName: "user-dashboard/workflow_details",
      pageName: "user-dashboard/workflow_details",
      contexts: {
        persona: personaName,
        agentId: agent.id,
        agentName: agent.name,
        flow_name: agent.ai_workflow_name,
        ai_project_name: aiProjectName,
        flow_type: flowType
      }
    };

    window.top.postMessage(cfxAction);
  }

  window.launchAgenticWorkflowsById = function(agentId) {
    if (!agentId) return;
    const a = agents.find(x => x.id === agentId);
    if (a) launchAgenticWorkflows(a);
  };

  window.launchfabaioById = function(agentId){
    if(!agentId) return;
    const a = agents.find(x => x.id === agentId);
    if(a) launchfabaio(a);
  };

  window.launchAIPersonaObserveDashboardById = function(agentId){
    if(!agentId) return;
    const a = agents.find(x => x.id === agentId);
    if(a) launchAIPersonaObserveDashboard(a);
  };

  function openPane(agent){
    $('#paneIcon').innerHTML = '';
    // Add default icon in the top-left box
    const iconContainer = document.getElementById('paneIcon');
    const iconUrl = agent.icon || "https://www.fabrix.ai/images/icons/ai_agent_icon.svg";
    iconContainer.innerHTML = `<img src="${iconUrl}" alt="Agent Icon" style="width:44px;height:44px;">`;
    $('#paneTitle').textContent = agent.name;
    // Remove old badge if exists
    const oldBadge = $('#paneBadge');
    if(oldBadge) oldBadge.remove();
    // Tags
    const tagsContainer = $('#paneTags');
    tagsContainer.innerHTML = '';
    const categoryTag = document.createElement('span');
    categoryTag.className = 'pane-tag';
    categoryTag.textContent = agent.category;
    tagsContainer.appendChild(categoryTag);
    agent.tags.forEach(tag => {
      const tagEl = document.createElement('span');
      tagEl.className = 'pane-tag';
      tagEl.textContent = tag;
      tagsContainer.appendChild(tagEl);
    });

    // Build Tabs based on data presence
    const hasDocs = Array.isArray(agent.documents) && agent.documents.length > 0;
    const hasImages = Array.isArray(agent.images) && agent.images.length > 0;
    const hasVideos = false; // disable videos for temporary
    // const hasVideos = Array.isArray(agent.videos) && agent.videos.length > 0;

    const contactItems = (() => {
      const items = [];
      if(Array.isArray(agent.contact)){
        agent.contact.forEach(c => {
          if(c.email) items.push({ type:'email', value:c.email, label:c.name || 'Email' });
          if(c.phone) items.push({ type:'phone', value:c.phone, label:c.name || 'Phone' });
          if(c.website) items.push({ type:'website', value:c.website, label:c.name || 'Website' });
          if(c.chat) items.push({ type:'chat', value:c.chat, label:c.name || 'Live Chat' });
        });
      } else if(agent.contact && typeof agent.contact === 'object'){
        const c = agent.contact;
        if(c.email) items.push({ type:'email', value:c.email, label:'Email' });
        if(c.phone) items.push({ type:'phone', value:c.phone, label:'Phone' });
        if(c.website) items.push({ type:'website', value:c.website, label:'Website' });
        if(c.chat) items.push({ type:'chat', value:c.chat, label:'Live Chat' });
      }
      return items;
    })();
    const hasContact = contactItems.length > 0;
    const hasRelated = Array.isArray(agent.related) && agent.related.length > 0;

    const tabs = [];
    if(hasDocs) tabs.push('documents');
    if(hasImages) tabs.push('images');
    // if(hasVideos) tabs.push('videos');
    if(hasContact) tabs.push('contact');
    if(hasRelated) tabs.push('related');

    // Pick first available as active, else none
    const initialTab = tabs[0] || null;
    activeTab = initialTab || 'documents';

    function renderTabsNav(){
      if(tabs.length === 0) return '';
      const labelMap = { documents:'Documents', images:'Images', videos:'Videos', contact:'Contact', related:'Related' };
      const buttons = tabs.map(tab => `<button class="tab-btn ${tab===initialTab?'active':''}" data-tab="${tab}" onclick="switchTabGlobal('${tab}')">${labelMap[tab] || (tab.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+tab.slice(1))}</button>`).join('');
      return `
        <div class="tabs-nav-container">
          <button class="tab-nav-btn left" onclick="scrollTabsGlobal('left')">
            <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"><polyline points="15 18 9 12 15 6"/></svg>
          </button>
          <div class="tabs-nav"><div class="tabs-scroll">${buttons}</div></div>
          <button class="tab-nav-btn right" onclick="scrollTabsGlobal('right')">
            <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"><polyline points="9 18 15 12 9 6"/></svg>
          </button>
        </div>`;
    }

  function renderDocs() {
  if (!hasDocs) return '';

  const items = agent.documents.map(doc => {
    const isExternal = doc.url.startsWith('http');
    const fileType = (doc.type || '').toLowerCase();

    // For external URLs → open in new tab
    if (isExternal) {
      return `
        <a class="document-item" href="${doc.url}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
          <div class="document-icon">
            <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24">
              <path d="M14 2H6a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v16a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h12a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V8z"/>
              <polyline points="14 2 14 8 20 8"/>
            </svg>
          </div>
          <div class="document-info">
            <div class="document-name">${doc.name || 'Document'}</div>
            <div class="document-meta">${[fileType, doc.size].filter(Boolean).join(' • ')}</div>
          </div>
        </a>`;
    }

    // For internal docs → open inline preview in modal
    return `
      <div class="document-item" style="cursor:pointer"
           onclick="openDocModal('${doc.url}', '${doc.name || 'Document'}', '${fileType}')">
        <div class="document-icon">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24">
            <path d="M14 2H6a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v16a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h12a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V8z"/>
            <polyline points="14 2 14 8 20 8"/>
          </svg>
        </div>
        <div class="document-info">
          <div class="document-name">${doc.name || 'Document'}</div>
          <div class="document-meta">${fileType || 'File'}</div>
        </div>
      </div>`;
  }).join('');

  return `
    <div class="tab-content ${initialTab === 'documents' ? 'active' : ''}" data-tab="documents">
      <div class="tab-section">
        <div class="tab-section-title">Product Documents</div>
        <div class="document-list">${items}</div>
      </div>
    </div>`;
}

    function renderImages(){
    if(!hasImages) return '';
    const items = agent.images.map(img => `
      <div class="gallery-item">
        ${img.url ? `
          <img src="${img.url}" 
              alt="${img.alt || agent.name}" 
              style="cursor: pointer; border-radius: 8px;"
              onclick="openImageModal('${img.url}', '${img.name || agent.name}')">
        ` : `
          <div class="gallery-placeholder">
            <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24">
              <rect x="3" y="3" width="18" height="18" rx="2" ry="2"/>
              <circle cx="8.5" cy="8.5" r="1.5"/>
              <polyline points="21 15 16 10 5 21"/>
            </svg>
          </div>
        `}
      </div>
    `).join('');
    
    return `
      <div class="tab-content ${initialTab==='images'?'active':''}" data-tab="images">
        <div class="tab-section">
          <div class="tab-section-title">Screenshots & Diagrams</div>
          <div class="image-gallery">${items}</div>
        </div>
      </div>`;
  }


    function renderVideos() {
      if (!hasVideos) return '';

      const items = agent.videos.map(v => {
        const isExternal = v.url.startsWith('http');
        const thumbHTML = v.thumb
          ? `<img src="${v.thumb}" alt="${v.title || 'Video'}" style="width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;border-radius:8px"/>`
          : `<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><polygon points="5 3 19 12 5 21 5 3"/></svg>`;

        // External URLs — open in new tab
        if (isExternal) {
          return `
            <a class="video-item" href="${v.url}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
              <div class="video-thumb">${thumbHTML}</div>
              <div class="video-info">
                <div class="video-title">${v.title || 'Video'}</div>
                <div class="video-duration">${v.duration || ''}</div>
              </div>

        }

        // Local videos — open in modal player
        return `
          <div class="video-item" style="cursor:pointer"
              onclick="openVideoModal('${v.url}', '${v.title || 'Video'}')">
            <div class="video-thumb">${thumbHTML}</div>

              <div class="video-title">${v.title || 'Video'}</div>

      return `

    function renderContact(){
      if(!hasContact) return '';
      const iconEmail = '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M4 4h16c1.1 0 2 .9 2 2v12c0 1.1-.9 2-2 2H4c-1.1 0-2-.9-2-2V6c0-1.1.9-2 2-2z"/><polyline points="22,6 12,13 2,6"/></svg>';
      const iconPhone = '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M22 16.92v3a2 2 0 0 1-2.18 2 19.79 19.79 0 0 1-8.63-3.07 19.5 19.5 0 0 1-6-6 19.79 19.79 0 0 1-3.07-8.67A2 2 0 0 1 4.11 2h3a2 2 0 0 1 2 1.72 12.84 12.84 0 0 0 .7 2.81 2 2 0 0 1-.45 2.11L8.09 9.91a16 16 0 0 0 6 6l1.27-1.27a2 2 0 0 1 2.11-.45 12.84 12.84 0 0 0 2.81.7A2 2 0 0 1 22 16.92z"/></svg>';
      const iconWeb = '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"/><line x1="2" y1="12" x2="22" y2="12"/><path d="M12 2a15.3 15.3 0 0 1 4 10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1-4 10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1-4-10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1 4-10z"/></svg>';
      const iconChat = '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21 11.5a8.38 8.38 0 0 1-.9 3.8 8.5 8.5 0 0 1-7.6 4.7 8.38 8.38 0 0 1-3.8-.9L3 21l1.9-5.7a8.38 8.38 0 0 1-.9-3.8 8.5 8.5 0 0 1 4.7-7.6 8.38 8.38 0 0 1 3.8-.9h.5a8.48 8.48 0 0 1 8 8v.5z"/></svg>';

      const itemsHtml = contactItems.map(ci => {
        if(ci.type === 'email'){
          return `
            <a class="contact-item" href="mailto:${ci.value}">
              <div class="contact-icon">${iconEmail}</div>
              <div class="contact-details"><div class="contact-label">${ci.label}</div><div class="contact-value">${ci.value}</div></div>

        }
        if(ci.type === 'website'){
          const site = ci.value;

          return `
            <a class="contact-item" href="${href}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
              <div class="contact-icon">${iconWeb}</div>

            <div class="contact-details"><div class="contact-label">${ci.label}</div><div class="contact-value">${ci.value}</div></div>

      return `<div class="tab-content ${initialTab==='contact'?'active':''}" data-tab="contact">
        <div class="tab-section">

          <div class="contact-grid">${itemsHtml}</div>

    }

    function renderRelated(){
      if(!hasRelated) return '';
      const items = agent.related.map(r => {
        const relName = r.name || '';
        const relDesc = r.description || r.decription || '';
        return `
          <div class="document-item" onclick="openAgentByName('${relName.replace(/'/g, "'")}')">

    const tabsNavHtml = renderTabsNav();

    $('#paneContent').innerHTML = `

      <div class="action-buttons">

  function closePane(){
    $('#sidePane').classList.remove('open');
    $('.main-content').classList.remove('pane-open');
    $('#backdrop').classList.remove('active');
  }

  window.switchTabGlobal = switchTab;
  window.scrollTabsGlobal = scrollTabs;
  window.openAgentByName = (name)=>{
    if(!name) return;
    const a = agents.find(x => x.name && x.name.toLowerCase() === String(name).toLowerCase());
    if(a) openPane(a);
  };

  $('#closePane').addEventListener('click', closePane);
  $('#backdrop').addEventListener('click', closePane);

  function renderAll(){
    const isSearching = searchQuery.trim() !== '';
    
    if(isSearching){
      $('#sectionsContainer').classList.add('search-active');
      $('#searchResults').classList.add('active');
      $('#searchResultsGrid').innerHTML = '';
      
      const base = showAllAgents ? agents : agents.filter(a => (a.state || '').toLowerCase() === 'enabled');
      let filteredAgents = base.filter(agent => {
        const name = (agent.name || '').toLowerCase();
        const category = (agent.category || '').toLowerCase();
        const tagsText = Array.isArray(agent.tags) ? agent.tags.join(' ').toLowerCase() : '';
        const description = (agent.description || '').toLowerCase();
        return (
          name.includes(searchQuery) ||
          category.includes(searchQuery) ||
          tagsText.includes(searchQuery) ||
          description.includes(searchQuery)
        );
      });

      filteredAgents.sort((a, b) => {
        if(sortBy === 'name') return a.name.localeCompare(b.name);
        if(sortBy === 'category') return a.category.localeCompare(b.category);
        if(sortBy === 'recent') return new Date(b.lastRun) - new Date(a.lastRun);
        if(sortBy === 'version') return b.version.localeCompare(a.version);
      });

      if(filteredAgents.length === 0){
        $('#searchResultsGrid').innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">No agents found matching your search.</div>';
        $('#searchCount').textContent = '0 agents found';
      } else {
        const categorizedResults = {};
        filteredAgents.forEach(agent => {
          if(!categorizedResults[agent.category]){
            categorizedResults[agent.category] = [];
          }
          categorizedResults[agent.category].push(agent);
        });

        Object.entries(categorizedResults).forEach(([category, categoryAgents]) => {
          const groupDiv = document.createElement('div');
          groupDiv.className = 'search-category-group';
          
          const headerDiv = document.createElement('div');
          headerDiv.className = 'search-category-header';
          headerDiv.textContent = `${category} (${categoryAgents.length})`;
          groupDiv.appendChild(headerDiv);

          const tilesDiv = document.createElement('div');
          tilesDiv.className = 'search-category-tiles';
          categoryAgents.forEach(agent => {
            tilesDiv.appendChild(tile(agent));
          });
          groupDiv.appendChild(tilesDiv);

          $('#searchResultsGrid').appendChild(groupDiv);
        });

        $('#searchCount').textContent = `${filteredAgents.length} agent${filteredAgents.length === 1 ? '' : 's'} found in ${Object.keys(categorizedResults).length} categor${Object.keys(categorizedResults).length === 1 ? 'y' : 'ies'}`;
      }
      
    } else {
      $('#sectionsContainer').classList.remove('search-active');
      $('#searchResults').classList.remove('active');
      
      // Clear dynamic categories and favorites
      $('#categoriesContainer').innerHTML = '';
      $('#favorites-grid').innerHTML = '';

      let sortedAgents = [...agents];
      sortedAgents.sort((a, b) => {
        if(sortBy === 'name') return a.name.localeCompare(b.name);
        if(sortBy === 'category') return a.category.localeCompare(b.category);
        if(sortBy === 'recent') return new Date(b.lastRun) - new Date(a.lastRun);
        if(sortBy === 'version') return b.version.localeCompare(a.version);
      });

      // Filter by enabled/disabled based on toggle
      const filteredByState = showAllAgents ? sortedAgents : sortedAgents.filter(a => (a.state || '').toLowerCase() === 'enabled');

      const favAgents = filteredByState.filter(a => favSet.has(a.id));
      if(favAgents.length === 0){
        $('#favorites-grid').innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">No favorites yet. Star some agents to see them here!</div>';
      } else {
        favAgents.forEach(agent => {
          $('#favorites-grid').appendChild(tile(agent));
        });
      }
      $('#fav-count').textContent = favAgents.length;

      // Derive categories from agents.json
      const categories = Array.from(new Set(filteredByState.map(a => a.category))).sort();
      categories.forEach(catName => {
        const section = document.createElement('div');
        section.className = 'category-section';
        const headerId = `${catName.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g,'-')}-count`;
        section.innerHTML = `
          <div class="section-header" data-section="${catName.toLowerCase()}">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>${catName.toUpperCase()}</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="${headerId}">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid"></div>
        `;
        const grid = section.querySelector('.section-grid');
        const catAgents = filteredByState.filter(a => a.category === catName);
        if(catAgents.length === 0){
          grid.innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">No agents in this category</div>';
        } else {
          catAgents.forEach(a => grid.appendChild(tile(a)));
        }
        const countEl = section.querySelector('.section-count');
        if(countEl) countEl.textContent = catAgents.length;
        section.querySelector('.section-header').addEventListener('click', (e)=>{
          const header = e.currentTarget;
          header.classList.toggle('collapsed');
          header.nextElementSibling.classList.toggle('collapsed');
        });
        $('#categoriesContainer').appendChild(section);
      });
    }
  }

  $$('.section-header').forEach(header => {
    header.addEventListener('click', () => {
      header.classList.toggle('collapsed');
      header.nextElementSibling.classList.toggle('collapsed');
    });
  });

  $('#searchInput').addEventListener('input', (e) => {
    searchQuery = e.target.value.toLowerCase();
    renderAll();
  });

  const showAllEl = document.getElementById('showAllToggle');
  if(showAllEl){
    showAllEl.checked = false;
    showAllEl.addEventListener('change', (e)=>{
      showAllAgents = !!e.target.checked;
      renderAll();
    });
  }
  
let currentImageIndex = 0;
let currentImages = [];

function openImageModal(src, name) {
  const modal = document.getElementById("imgModal");
  const modalImg = document.getElementById("imgModalContent");
  const caption = document.getElementById("imgModalCaption");
  const closeBtn = document.getElementById("imgModalClose");
  const prevBtn = document.getElementById("imgModalPrev");
  const nextBtn = document.getElementById("imgModalNext");

  // collect all visible images in current gallery
  currentImages = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(".image-gallery img"));
  currentImageIndex = currentImages.findIndex(img => img.src === src);

  modal.style.display = "block";
  modalImg.src = src;
  caption.textContent = name || '';

  updateArrowState(); // ✅ disable arrows if needed

  closeBtn.onclick = () => closeImageModal();
  prevBtn.onclick = showPrevImage;
  nextBtn.onclick = showNextImage;

  modal.onclick = e => {
    if (e.target === modal) closeImageModal();
  };
}

function showPrevImage() {
  if (currentImageIndex > 0) {
    currentImageIndex--;
    const img = currentImages[currentImageIndex];
    openImageModal(img.src, img.alt);
  }
}

function showNextImage() {
  if (currentImageIndex < currentImages.length - 1) {
    currentImageIndex++;
    const img = currentImages[currentImageIndex];
    openImageModal(img.src, img.alt);
  }
}

function updateArrowState() {
  const prevBtn = document.getElementById("imgModalPrev");
  const nextBtn = document.getElementById("imgModalNext");

  prevBtn.style.opacity = currentImageIndex === 0 ? "0.3" : "1";
  prevBtn.style.pointerEvents = currentImageIndex === 0 ? "none" : "auto";

  nextBtn.style.opacity = currentImageIndex === currentImages.length - 1 ? "0.3" : "1";
  nextBtn.style.pointerEvents = currentImageIndex === currentImages.length - 1 ? "none" : "auto";
}

function closeImageModal() {
  const modal = document.getElementById("imgModal");
  modal.style.display = "none";
  document.getElementById("imgModalContent").src = '';
}



function openDocModal(url, name, type) {
  const modal = document.getElementById("docModal");
  const frame = document.getElementById("docModalFrame");
  const caption = document.getElementById("docModalCaption");
  const closeBtn = document.getElementById("docModalClose");
  const textEl = document.getElementById("docModalText");
  const markdownEl = document.getElementById("docModalMarkdown");
  const wrapper = document.getElementById("docModalContentWrapper");

  // Reset views
  frame.style.display = "none";
  wrapper.style.display = "none";
  textEl.textContent = '';
  markdownEl.innerHTML = '';

  modal.style.display = "block";
  caption.textContent = name + (type ? ` (${type.toUpperCase()})` : '');

  if (type === 'pdf') {
    // show in iframe
    frame.src = url;
    frame.style.display = "block";
  } 
  else if (type === 'txt' || type === 'md') {
    // fetch and render text/markdown
    fetch(url)
      .then(res => res.text())
      .then(data => {
        wrapper.style.display = "block";
        if (type === 'md') {
          // render markdown → basic HTML formatting
          markdownEl.innerHTML = renderMarkdown(data);
          markdownEl.style.display = "block";
          textEl.style.display = "none";
        } else {
          textEl.textContent = data;
          textEl.style.display = "block";
          markdownEl.style.display = "none";
        }
      })
      .catch(err => {
        wrapper.style.display = "block";
        textEl.textContent = 'Error loading document.';
        textEl.style.display = "block";
      });
  } 
  else {
    // fallback → iframe for other file types
    frame.src = url;
    frame.style.display = "block";
  }

  closeBtn.onclick = function() {
    modal.style.display = "none";
    frame.src = '';
  };

  modal.onclick = function(e) {
    if (e.target === modal) {
      modal.style.display = "none";
      frame.src = '';
    }
  };
}

// simple markdown renderer (headings, bold, italics, links, lists)
function renderMarkdown(md) {
  let html = md
    .replace(/^### (.*$)/gim, '<h3>$1</h3>')
    .replace(/^## (.*$)/gim, '<h2>$1</h2>')
    .replace(/^# (.*$)/gim, '<h1>$1</h1>')
    .replace(/\*\*(.*?)\*\*/gim, '<b>$1</b>')
    .replace(/\*(.*?)\*/gim, '<i>$1</i>')
    .replace(/\[(.*?)\]\((.*?)\)/gim, '<a href="$2" target="_blank">$1</a>')
    .replace(/^\s*[-*] (.*$)/gim, '<ul><li>$1</li></ul>')
    .replace(/\n$/gim, '<br />');
  
  // Merge adjacent <ul> tags (for multiple list items)
  html = html.replace(/<\/ul>\s*<ul>/g, '');
  return html.trim();
}

function openVideoModal(url, title) {
  const modal = document.getElementById("videoModal");
  const player = document.getElementById("videoModalPlayer");
  const caption = document.getElementById("videoModalCaption");
  const closeBtn = document.getElementById("videoModalClose");

  modal.style.display = "block";
  player.src = url;
  caption.textContent = title;

  closeBtn.onclick = function() {
    modal.style.display = "none";
    player.pause();
    player.src = '';
  };

  modal.onclick = function(e) {
    if (e.target === modal) {
      modal.style.display = "none";
      player.pause();
      player.src = '';
    }
  };
}

document.addEventListener('keydown', e => {
  const modal = document.getElementById('imgModal');
  if (modal.style.display !== 'block') return;
  if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') showPrevImage();
  if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') showNextImage();
  if (e.key === 'Escape') closeImageModal();
});

  loadData();
