attachments.value:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" data-theme="dark"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1">
<title>Agent Marketplace</title>
<style>
  :root{
    --bg:#161B21;                 /* cfxbackground */
    --bg-secondary:#282F3A;       /* cfxcard */
    --card:#282F3A;               /* cfxcard */
    --text:#F5F5F5;               /* cfxtext (grey.lighten4) */
    --text-secondary:#E0E0E0;     /* cfxtabtext (grey.lighten2) */
    --text-muted:#9E9E9E;         /* cfxgrey (grey.base) */
    --border:#313946;             /* cfx3rdlevel */
    --accent:#FB8C00;             /* orange.darken1 */
    --accent-hover:#F57C00;       /* orange.darken2 */
    --accent-light:rgba(251,140,0,.15);
    --accent-border:rgba(251,140,0,.3);
    --green:#4CAF50;              /* success */
    --red:#D32F2F;                /* red.darken2 */
    --shadow:rgba(0,0,0,.5);
  }

  [data-theme="light"]{
    --bg:#f9f9f9;                 /* cfxbackground */
    --bg-secondary:#FFFFFF;       /* cfxcard */
    --card:#FFFFFF;               /* cfxcard */
    --text:#212121;               /* cfxtext (grey.darken4) */
    --text-secondary:#757575;     /* cfxtabtext (grey.darken1) */
    --text-muted:#9E9E9E;         /* cfxgrey (grey.base) */
    --border:#EEEEEE;             /* secondary-lighten-1 */
    --accent:#FF9800;             /* orange.base */
    --accent-hover:#FB8C00;       /* orange.darken1 */
    --accent-light:rgba(255,152,0,.08);
    --accent-border:rgba(255,152,0,.25);
    --green:#4CAF50;              /* success */
    --red:#E53935;                /* red.darken1 */
    --shadow:rgba(0,0,0,.08);
  }

  *{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}
  html,body{height:100%;overflow:hidden;width:100%}
  body{
    background:var(--bg);
    color:var(--text);
    font:14px/1.5 -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;
    -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;
    transition:background .3s ease, color .3s ease;
  }

  .container{
    display:flex;
    height:100vh;
    position:relative;
  }

  .main-content{
    flex:1;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    overflow:hidden;
    transition:margin-right .3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  }

  .main-content.pane-open{
    margin-right:520px;
  }

  .top-bar{
    padding:20px 32px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
    background:var(--bg-secondary);
    display:flex;
    gap:16px;
    align-items:center;
    box-shadow:0 2px 8px var(--shadow);
    position:relative;
    z-index:50;
  }

  .search-wrapper{
    position:relative;
    flex:1;
    max-width:600px;
  }

  .search-icon{
    position:absolute;
    left:16px;
    top:50%;
    transform:translateY(-50%);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    pointer-events:none;
  }

  .search-input{
    width:100%;
    padding:12px 16px 12px 46px;
    background:var(--bg);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:10px;
    color:var(--text);
    font-size:14px;
    outline:none;
    transition:all .2s;
  }

  .search-input:focus{
    border-color:var(--accent);
    box-shadow:0 0 0 3px var(--accent-light);
  }

  .search-input::placeholder{
    color:var(--text-muted);
  }

  .top-bar-actions{
    display:flex;
    gap:12px;
    align-items:center;
    margin-left:auto;
  }

  .theme-toggle{
    width:42px;
    height:42px;
    border-radius:10px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .theme-toggle:hover{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    color:var(--accent);
  }

  .theme-toggle svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
  }

  .sort-select{
    padding:12px 38px 12px 16px;
    background:var(--card) url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="%23707070" stroke-width="2"><path d="m6 9 6 6 6-6"/></svg>') no-repeat right 12px center;
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:10px;
    color:var(--text);
    font-size:14px;
    outline:none;
    cursor:pointer;
    appearance:none;
    transition:all .2s;
    min-width:180px;
  }

  .sort-select:hover, .sort-select:focus{
    border-color:var(--accent);
    box-shadow:0 0 0 3px var(--accent-light);
  }

  .sort-select option{
    background:var(--card);
    color:var(--text);
  }

  .sections-container{
    flex:1;
    overflow-y:auto;
    overflow-x:hidden;
    padding:28px 32px;
  }

  .search-results-container{
    display:none;
  }

  .search-results-container.active{
    display:block;
  }

  .sections-container.search-active .category-section{
    display:none;
  }

  .search-results-grid{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:32px;
  }

  .search-category-group{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:16px;
  }

  .search-category-header{
    font-size:16px;
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--text);
    padding:12px 0;
    border-bottom:2px solid var(--accent);
    letter-spacing:.3px;
  }

  .search-category-tiles{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(340px,1fr));
    gap:20px;
  }

  .search-header{
    margin-bottom:24px;
    padding-bottom:16px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .search-header h2{
    font-size:18px;
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:700;
  }

  .search-header .count{
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:14px;
    margin-top:6px;
  }

  .category-section{
    margin-bottom:28px;
    overflow:visible;
  }

  .section-header{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    justify-content:space-between;
    padding:16px 20px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:12px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
    user-select:none;
    margin-bottom:16px;
  }

  .section-header:hover{
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .section-title{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .section-title h2{
    font-size:16px;
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--text);
  }

  .section-count{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    padding:4px 10px;
    border-radius:12px;
    font-size:12px;
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--accent);
    border:1px solid var(--accent-border);
  }

  .toggle-icon{
    transition:transform .3s;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:18px;
  }

  .section-header.collapsed .toggle-icon{
    transform:rotate(-90deg);
  }

  .section-grid{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(340px,1fr));
    gap:20px;
    max-height:2000px;
    overflow:visible;
    transition:max-height .3s ease, opacity .3s ease;
    opacity:1;
  }

  .section-grid.collapsed{
    max-height:0;
    opacity:0;
  }

  .card{
    position:relative;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:12px;
    padding:20px;
    transition:all .2s;
    cursor:pointer;
    overflow:visible;
    box-shadow:0 2px 8px var(--shadow);
    min-height:200px;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
  }
  
  .card:hover{
    border-color:var(--accent);
    box-shadow:0 4px 16px var(--shadow);
    transform:translateY(-2px);
  }

  .card:active{
    transform:translateY(0);
  }

  .card.hidden{display:none}

  .fav{
    position:absolute;
    top:16px;
    right:16px;
    background:var(--bg);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:8px;
    padding:6px;
    cursor:pointer;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    z-index:10;
    transition:all .2s;
  }
  
  .fav:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
  }
  
  .fav svg{
    width:18px;
    height:18px;
    fill:none;
    stroke:currentColor;
    stroke-width:2.5;
    transition:all .2s;
  }
  
  .fav.active{
    color:var(--accent);
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-color:var(--accent);
  }
  
  .fav.active svg{
    fill:var(--accent);
    stroke:var(--accent);
  }

  .head{
    display:flex;
    align-items:flex-start;
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:16px;
    padding-right:40px;
  }

  .icon-wrap{
    width:48px;
    height:48px;
    border-radius:12px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border:1px solid var(--accent-border);
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .icon-wrap svg{
    width:24px;
    height:24px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    stroke-width:2;
    stroke-linecap:round;
    stroke-linejoin:round;
    fill:none;
  }

  .title-area{
    min-width:0;
    flex:1;
  }

  .name{
    font-size:16px;
    font-weight:600;
    margin:0 0 6px;
    color:var(--text);
    line-height:1.4;
  }

  .badge{
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:11px;
    padding:4px 10px;
    border-radius:10px;
    color:#FFF;
    background:var(--accent);
    font-weight:600;
    letter-spacing:.3px;
  }

  .meta{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-top:auto;
    padding-top:16px;
    border-top:1px solid var(--border);
    font-size:12px;
  }

  .kv{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:4px;
  }

  .k{
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-size:10px;
    font-weight:600;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
  }

  .v{
    color:var(--text);
    font-size:13px;
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .state-indicator{
    grid-column:1/-1;
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:8px;
    padding:8px 12px;
    background:var(--bg);
    border-radius:8px;
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    font-size:12px;
    font-weight:600;
  }

  .dot{
    width:6px;
    height:6px;
    border-radius:50%;
    background:var(--green);
  }

  .state-indicator.disabled{
    color:var(--red);
  }

  .state-indicator.disabled .dot{
    background:var(--red);
  }

  .state-indicator:not(.disabled){
    color:var(--green);
  }

  .empty-section{
    text-align:center;
    padding:40px 20px;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-size:14px;
  }

  .side-pane{
    position:fixed;
    top:0;
    right:-520px;
    width:520px;
    max-width:100%;
    height:100vh;
    background:var(--bg-secondary);
    border-left:1px solid var(--border);
    box-shadow:-4px 0 24px var(--shadow);
    overflow-y:auto;
    transition:right .3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    z-index:100;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
  }

  .side-pane.open{
    right:0;
  }

  .pane-header{
    position:sticky;
    top:0;
    background:var(--bg-secondary);
    padding:24px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
    display:flex;
    align-items:flex-start;
    gap:16px;
    z-index:10;
    box-shadow:0 2px 8px var(--shadow);
  }

  .close-btn{
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:10px;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    cursor:pointer;
    padding:8px;
    transition:all .2s;
    margin-left:auto;
  }

  .close-btn:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
  }

  .close-btn svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
  }

  .pane-content{
    padding:24px;
    flex:1;
  }

  .detail-section{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .detail-title{
    font-size:11px;
    font-weight:700;
    letter-spacing:1px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:12px;
  }

  .detail-value{
    font-size:14px;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    line-height:1.6;
  }

  .detail-grid{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .detail-item{
    background:var(--card);
    padding:16px;
    border-radius:10px;
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    transition:all .2s;
  }

  .detail-item:hover{
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    box-shadow:0 2px 8px var(--shadow);
  }

  .detail-item-label{
    font-size:10px;
    font-weight:600;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:6px;
  }

  .detail-item-value{
    font-size:14px;
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:600;
  }

  .pane-icon{
    width:64px;
    height:64px;
    border-radius:14px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border:1px solid var(--accent-border);
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .pane-icon svg{
    width:32px;
    height:32px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    stroke-width:2;
    stroke-linecap:round;
    stroke-linejoin:round;
    fill:none;
  }

  .pane-title-area{
    flex:1;
  }

  .pane-title-area h2{
    font-size:20px;
    margin:0 0 10px;
    line-height:1.3;
    color:var(--text);
  }

  .pane-tags{
    display:flex;
    flex-wrap:wrap;
    gap:6px;
    margin-top:0;
  }

  .pane-tag{
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:11px;
    padding:5px 12px;
    border-radius:6px;
    background:var(--accent);
    color:#FFF;
    border-color:var(--accent);
    font-weight:500;
    letter-spacing:.3px;
  }

  .action-buttons{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:32px;
  }

  .action-btn{
    padding:14px 20px;
    background:var(--accent);
    border:none;
    border-radius:10px;
    color:#FFF;
    font-size:13px;
    font-weight:600;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
    text-align:center;
  }

  .action-btn:hover{
    background:var(--accent-hover);
    transform:translateY(-1px);
    box-shadow:0 4px 12px rgba(232,93,4,.3);
  }

  .action-btn:active{
    transform:translateY(0);
  }

  .tabs-wrapper{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tabs-nav-container{
    position:relative;
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tabs-nav{
    display:flex;
    gap:8px;
    overflow:hidden;
    padding-bottom:12px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .tabs-scroll{
    display:flex;
    gap:8px;
    transition:transform .3s ease;
  }

  .tab-btn{
    padding:10px 18px;
    background:transparent;
    border:none;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:12px;
    font-weight:600;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
    white-space:nowrap;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    border-radius:8px;
    position:relative;
  }

  .tab-btn:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .tab-btn.active{
    color:var(--accent);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .tab-btn.active::after{
    content:'';
    position:absolute;
    bottom:-12px;
    left:0;
    right:0;
    height:2px;
    background:var(--accent);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn{
    position:absolute;
    top:50%;
    transform:translateY(-50%);
    width:32px;
    height:32px;
    border-radius:8px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
    z-index:5;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn:hover{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    color:var(--accent);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.left{
    left:-8px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.right{
    right:-8px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.hidden{
    display:none;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn svg{
    width:16px;
    height:16px;
  }

  .tab-content{
    display:none;
    animation:fadeIn .3s ease;
  }

  .tab-content.active{
    display:block;
  }

  @keyframes fadeIn{
    from{opacity:0;transform:translateY(8px)}
    to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}
  }

  .tab-section{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tab-section-title{
    font-size:11px;
    font-weight:700;
    letter-spacing:1px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:12px;
    padding-bottom:8px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .tab-section-content{
    font-size:14px;
    line-height:1.6;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .tab-section-content ul{
    list-style:none;
    padding:0;
  }

  .tab-section-content li{
    padding:6px 0;
    padding-left:18px;
    position:relative;
  }

  .tab-section-content li:before{
    content:'•';
    position:absolute;
    left:0;
    color:var(--accent);
    font-weight:bold;
  }

  .contact-grid{
    display:grid;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .contact-item{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:12px;
    padding:14px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:10px;
    transition:all .2s;
  }

  .contact-item:hover{
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    box-shadow:0 2px 8px var(--shadow);
  }

  .contact-icon{
    width:36px;
    height:36px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-radius:8px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .contact-icon svg{
    width:18px;
    height:18px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:2;
  }

  .contact-details{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .contact-label{
    font-size:10px;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:600;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    margin-bottom:4px;
  }

  .contact-value{
    font-size:13px;
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:500;
    word-break:break-all;
  }

  .image-gallery{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap:12px;
  }

  .gallery-item{
    aspect-ratio:16/9;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:10px;
    overflow:hidden;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
  }

  .gallery-item:hover{
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    box-shadow:0 4px 12px var(--shadow);
    transform:scale(1.02);
  }

  .gallery-placeholder{
    color:var(--text-muted);
  }

  .gallery-placeholder svg{
    width:32px;
    height:32px;
    stroke:currentColor;
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:1.5;
  }

  .video-list{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .video-item{
    display:flex;
    gap:12px;
    padding:12px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:10px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
  }

  .video-item:hover{
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    box-shadow:0 2px 8px var(--shadow);
  }

  .video-thumb{
    width:100px;
    height:60px;
    background:var(--bg);
    border-radius:8px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    flex-shrink:0;
    border:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .video-thumb svg{
    width:24px;
    height:24px;
    fill:var(--accent);
  }

  .video-info{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .video-title{
    font-size:13px;
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:4px;
  }

  .video-duration{
    font-size:11px;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .document-list{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:10px;
  }

  .document-item{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:12px;
    padding:12px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius:10px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all .2s;
  }

  .document-item:hover{
    border-color:var(--accent-border);
    box-shadow:0 2px 8px var(--shadow);
  }

  .document-icon{
    width:36px;
    height:36px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-radius:8px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .document-icon svg{
    width:18px;
    height:18px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:2;
  }

  .document-info{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .document-name{
    font-size:13px;
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:2px;
  }

  .document-meta{
    font-size:11px;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:500;
  }
  
  a{ color:var(--accent); text-decoration:none }
  a:hover{ color:var(--accent-hover) }

  .troubleshooting-item{
    margin-bottom:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border-left:3px solid var(--accent);
    border-radius:8px;
    border:1px solid var(--border);
    border-left:3px solid var(--accent);
  }

  .troubleshooting-question{
    font-size:13px;
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:8px;
  }

  .troubleshooting-answer{
    font-size:13px;
    line-height:1.6;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .backdrop{
    position:fixed;
    top:0;
    left:0;
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    background:rgba(0,0,0,.6);
    backdrop-filter:blur(4px);
    opacity:0;
    pointer-events:none;
    transition:opacity .3s;
    z-index:99;
  }

  .backdrop.active{
    opacity:1;
    pointer-events:all;
  }

  @media (min-width: 1201px){
    .backdrop{
      display:none;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 1600px){
    .section-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(300px,1fr))}
    .search-category-tiles{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(300px,1fr))}
  }

  @media (max-width: 1200px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:520px;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 768px){
    .top-bar{
      flex-direction:column;
      align-items:stretch;
      padding:16px 20px;
    }
    .search-wrapper{
      max-width:100%;
    }
    .top-bar-actions{
      margin-left:0;
      justify-content:space-between;
    }
    .sort-select{
      flex:1;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:20px 16px;
    }
    .section-grid, .search-category-tiles{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .card{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .section-header{
      padding:14px 16px;
    }
    .action-buttons{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .image-gallery{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .detail-grid{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 600px){
    .pane-header{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:100%;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 480px){
    .top-bar{
      padding:12px 16px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:16px 12px;
    }
    .tab-btn{
      padding:8px 14px;
      font-size:11px;
    }
  }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar{width:8px;height:8px}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:var(--bg)}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:var(--border);border-radius:4px}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:var(--text-muted)}
</style>
</head>
<body>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="main-content">
      <div class="top-bar">
        <div class="search-wrapper">
          <svg class="search-icon" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
            <circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"></circle><path d="m21 21-4.35-4.35"></path>
          </svg>
          <input type="text" class="search-input" id="searchInput" placeholder="Search agents...">
        </div>
        <div class="top-bar-actions">
          <button class="theme-toggle" id="themeToggle" title="Toggle theme">
            <svg class="sun-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" style="display: block;">
              <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="5"></circle><line x1="12" y1="1" x2="12" y2="3"></line><line x1="12" y1="21" x2="12" y2="23"></line><line x1="4.22" y1="4.22" x2="5.64" y2="5.64"></line><line x1="18.36" y1="18.36" x2="19.78" y2="19.78"></line><line x1="1" y1="12" x2="3" y2="12"></line><line x1="21" y1="12" x2="23" y2="12"></line><line x1="4.22" y1="19.78" x2="5.64" y2="18.36"></line><line x1="18.36" y1="5.64" x2="19.78" y2="4.22"></line>
            </svg>
            <svg class="moon-icon" style="display: none;" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
              <path d="M21 12.79A9 9 0 1 1 11.21 3 7 7 0 0 0 21 12.79z"></path>
            </svg>
          </button>
          <select class="sort-select" id="sortSelect">
            <option value="name">Sort by Name</option>
            <option value="category">Sort by Category</option>
            <option value="recent">Sort by Recent</option>
            <option value="version">Sort by Version</option>
          </select>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="sections-container" id="sectionsContainer">
        <div class="search-results-container" id="searchResults">
          <div class="search-header">
            <h2>Search Results</h2>
            <div class="count" id="searchCount"></div>
          </div>
          <div class="search-results-grid" id="searchResultsGrid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section" id="favorites-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="favorites">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>FAVORITES</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="fav-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="favorites-grid"><div class="empty-section">No favorites yet. Star some agents to see them here!</div></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="aiops">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>AIOPS</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="aiops-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="aiops-grid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="observability">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>OBSERVABILITY</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="observability-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="observability-grid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="secops">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>SECOPS</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="secops-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="secops-grid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="sacm">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>SACM</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="sacm-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="sacm-grid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="serviceops">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>SERVICEOPS</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="serviceops-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="serviceops-grid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="dataops">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>DATAOPS</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="dataops-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="dataops-grid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="ops">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>OPS</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="ops-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="ops-grid"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="backdrop" id="backdrop"></div>

    <div class="side-pane" id="sidePane">
      <div class="pane-header">
        <div class="pane-icon" id="paneIcon"></div>
        <div class="pane-title-area">
          <h2 id="paneTitle"></h2>
          <div class="pane-tags" id="paneTags"></div>
        </div>
        <button class="close-btn" id="closePane">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
            <path d="M18 6L6 18M6 6l12 12"></path>
          </svg>
        </button>
      </div>
      <div class="pane-content" id="paneContent"></div>
    </div>
  </div>

<script>
  const icons = {
    bot: '<path d="M12 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 2c0 .74-.4 1.39-1 1.73V7h1a7 7 0 0 1 7 7h1a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v3a1 1 0 0 1-1 1h-1a7 7 0 0 1-7 7H9a7 7 0 0 1-7-7H1a1 1 0 0 1-1-1v-3a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h1a7 7 0 0 1 7-7h1V5.73c-.6-.34-1-.99-1-1.73a2 2 0 0 1 2-2z"/><circle cx="9" cy="13" r="1"/><circle cx="15" cy="13" r="1"/>',
    bell: '<path d="M18 8A6 6 0 0 0 6 8c0 7-3 9-3 9h18s-3-2-3-9M13.73 21a2 2 0 0 1-3.46 0"/>',
    puzzle: '<path d="M19.439 15.439v4.122A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 18 21H4a2 2 0 0 1-2-2v-6.439A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 3.439 11H6a2 2 0 0 0 0-4H3.439A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 2 5.561V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v1.561A1.439 1.439 0 0 1 18.561 7H16a2 2 0 0 0 0 4h2.561a1.439 1.439 0 0 1 .878 2.439z"/>',
    tool: '<path d="M14.7 6.3a1 1 0 0 0 0 1.4l1.6 1.6a1 1 0 0 0 1.4 0l3.77-3.77a6 6 0 0 1-7.94 7.94l-6.91 6.91a2.12 2.12 0 0 1-3-3l6.91-6.91a6 6 0 0 1 7.94-7.94l-3.76 3.76z"/>',
    box: '<path d="M21 16V8a2 2 0 0 0-1-1.73l-7-4a2 2 0 0 0-2 0l-7 4A2 2 0 0 0 3 8v8a2 2 0 0 0 1 1.73l7 4a2 2 0 0 0 2 0l7-4A2 2 0 0 0 21 16z"/><polyline points="3.27 6.96 12 12.01 20.73 6.96"/><line x1="12" y1="22.08" x2="12" y2="12"/>' ,
    pen: '<path d="M17 3a2.83 2.83 0 1 1 4 4L7.5 20.5 2 22l1.5-5.5L17 3z"/>',
    globe: '<circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"/><line x1="2" y1="12" x2="22" y2="12"/><path d="M12 2a15.3 15.3 0 0 1 4 10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1-4 10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1-4-10 15.3 15.3 0 0 1 4-10z"/>',
    toolbox: '<path d="M5 4h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v5a1 1 0 0 1-1 1H4a1 1 0 0 1-1-1V6a2 2 0 0 1 2-2z"/><path d="M3 12h18v7a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2v-7z"/><path d="M10 6V4a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h2a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v2"/>',
    user: '<path d="M20 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H8a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2"/><circle cx="12" cy="7" r="4"/>',
    satellite: '<path d="M13 7 9 3 5 7l4 4 4-4z"/><path d="m17 11 4 4-4 4-4-4 4-4z"/><path d="m8 12 4 4 6-6-4-4-6 6z"/><path d="M3 21a9 9 0 0 0 9-9"/>',
    chart: '<line x1="18" y1="20" x2="18" y2="10"/><line x1="12" y1="20" x2="12" y2="4"/><line x1="6" y1="20" x2="6" y2="14"/>',
    shield: '<path d="M12 22s8-4 8-10V5l-8-3-8 3v7c0 6 8 10 8 10z"/>'
  };

  let agents = [];
  let categoryMap = {};

  async function loadData(){
    try{
      const [agentsRes, categoriesRes] = await Promise.all([
        fetch("agents.json"),
        fetch("categories.json")
      ]);
      if(!agentsRes.ok || !categoriesRes.ok){
        throw new Error('Failed to load data files');
      }
      agents = await agentsRes.json();
      categoryMap = await categoriesRes.json();
      renderAll();
    } catch(err){
      console.error('Data load error:', err);
      const container = document.getElementById('sectionsContainer');
      if(container){
        container.innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">Failed to load data. Please verify files in data/.</div>';
      }
    }
  }

  const favKey = 'agentFavs';
  const themeKey = 'agentTheme';
  const favSet = new Set(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(favKey) || '[]'));
  const $ = (sel, el=document)=>el.querySelector(sel);
  const $$ = (sel, el=document)=>el.querySelectorAll(sel);

  let searchQuery = '';
  let sortBy = 'name';
  let activeTab = 'documents';
  let tabScrollPosition = 0;

  // Theme toggle
  const themeToggle = $('#themeToggle');
  const sunIcon = $('.sun-icon');
  const moonIcon = $('.moon-icon');
  
  const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || 'dark';
  if(savedTheme === 'light'){
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', 'light');
    sunIcon.style.display = 'none';
    moonIcon.style.display = 'block';
  }

  themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
    const currentTheme = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
    const newTheme = currentTheme === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light';
    
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', newTheme);
    localStorage.setItem(themeKey, newTheme);
    
    if(newTheme === 'light'){
      sunIcon.style.display = 'none';
      moonIcon.style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      sunIcon.style.display = 'block';
      moonIcon.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });

  function favButton(id){
    const btn = document.createElement('button');
    btn.className = 'fav' + (favSet.has(id) ? ' active' : '');
    btn.innerHTML = '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M12 17.3l-6.2 3.3 1.2-6.9L1 8.9l6.9-1 3.1-6.3 3.1 6.3 6.9 1-5 4.8 1.2 6.9z"/></svg>';
    btn.addEventListener('click', (e)=>{
      e.stopPropagation();
      if(favSet.has(id)){
        favSet.delete(id);
        btn.classList.remove('active');
      } else {
        favSet.add(id);
        btn.classList.add('active');
      }
      localStorage.setItem(favKey, JSON.stringify([...favSet]));
      renderAll();
    });
    return btn;
  }

  function tile(agent){
    const card = document.createElement('div');
    card.className = 'card tile';
    card.dataset.id = agent.id;
    card.dataset.name = agent.name.toLowerCase();
    card.dataset.category = agent.category;

    card.appendChild(favButton(agent.id));

    const head = document.createElement('div');
    head.className = 'head';
    head.innerHTML = `
      <div class="icon-wrap">
        <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24">${icons[agent.icon]}</svg>
      </div>
      <div class="title-area">
        <h3 class="name">${agent.name}</h3>
        <span class="badge">${agent.category}</span>
      </div>
    `;
    card.appendChild(head);

    const meta = document.createElement('div');
    meta.className = 'meta';
    meta.innerHTML = `
      <div class="kv"><div class="k">Version</div><div class="v">${agent.version}</div></div>
      <div class="kv"><div class="k">Publisher</div><div class="v">${agent.publisher}</div></div>
      <div class="kv"><div class="k">Last Run</div><div class="v">${agent.lastRun}</div></div>
      <div class="state-indicator ${agent.state === 'Disabled' ? 'disabled' : ''}">
        <span class="dot"></span>${agent.state}
      </div>
    `;
    card.appendChild(meta);

    card.addEventListener('click', () => openPane(agent));

    return card;
  }

  function updateTabNavigation(){
    const container = document.querySelector('.tabs-nav-container');
    if(!container) return;
    
    const scroll = container.querySelector('.tabs-scroll');
    const leftBtn = container.querySelector('.tab-nav-btn.left');
    const rightBtn = container.querySelector('.tab-nav-btn.right');
    
    if(!scroll || !leftBtn || !rightBtn) return;
    
    const maxScroll = scroll.scrollWidth - scroll.parentElement.clientWidth;
    
    leftBtn.classList.toggle('hidden', tabScrollPosition <= 0);
    rightBtn.classList.toggle('hidden', tabScrollPosition >= maxScroll);
  }

  function scrollTabs(direction){
    const container = document.querySelector('.tabs-nav-container');
    if(!container) return;
    
    const scroll = container.querySelector('.tabs-scroll');
    if(!scroll) return;
    
    const scrollAmount = 200;
    const maxScroll = scroll.scrollWidth - scroll.parentElement.clientWidth;
    
    if(direction === 'left'){
      tabScrollPosition = Math.max(0, tabScrollPosition - scrollAmount);
    } else {
      tabScrollPosition = Math.min(maxScroll, tabScrollPosition + scrollAmount);
    }
    
    scroll.style.transform = `translateX(-${tabScrollPosition}px)`;
    updateTabNavigation();
  }

  function switchTab(tabName){
    activeTab = tabName;
    
    $$('.tab-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.classList.toggle('active', btn.dataset.tab === tabName);
    });
    
    $$('.tab-content').forEach(content => {
      content.classList.toggle('active', content.dataset.tab === tabName);
    });
  }

  function openPane(agent){
    $('#paneIcon').innerHTML = `<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24">${icons[agent.icon]}</svg>`;
    $('#paneTitle').textContent = agent.name;
    
    // Remove old badge if exists
    const oldBadge = $('#paneBadge');
    if(oldBadge) oldBadge.remove();
    
    // Add category as first tag, then other tags (all styled the same)
    const tagsContainer = $('#paneTags');
    tagsContainer.innerHTML = '';
    
    // Category tag first
    const categoryTag = document.createElement('span');
    categoryTag.className = 'pane-tag';
    categoryTag.textContent = agent.category;
    tagsContainer.appendChild(categoryTag);
    
    // Then add other tags
    agent.tags.forEach(tag => {
      const tagEl = document.createElement('span');
      tagEl.className = 'pane-tag';
      tagEl.textContent = tag;
      tagsContainer.appendChild(tagEl);
    });
    
    $('#paneContent').innerHTML = `
      <div class="detail-section">
        <div class="detail-title">Description</div>
        <div class="detail-value">
          This ${agent.category} agent provides automated monitoring and management capabilities for your infrastructure. It integrates seamlessly with your existing systems to deliver real-time insights and automated responses.
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="detail-grid">
        <div class="detail-item">
          <div class="detail-item-label">Version</div>
          <div class="detail-item-value">${agent.version}</div>
        </div>
        <div class="detail-item">
          <div class="detail-item-label">Publisher</div>

    activeTab = 'documents';

    setTimeout(updateTabNavigation, 100);
    
    $('#sidePane').classList.add('open');
    $('.main-content').classList.add('pane-open');
    $('#backdrop').classList.add('active');
  }

  function closePane(){
    $('#sidePane').classList.remove('open');
    $('.main-content').classList.remove('pane-open');
    $('#backdrop').classList.remove('active');
  }

  window.switchTabGlobal = switchTab;
  window.scrollTabsGlobal = scrollTabs;

  $('#closePane').addEventListener('click', closePane);
  $('#backdrop').addEventListener('click', closePane);

  function renderAll(){
    const isSearching = searchQuery.trim() !== '';
    
    if(isSearching){
      $('#sectionsContainer').classList.add('search-active');
      $('#searchResults').classList.add('active');
      $('#searchResultsGrid').innerHTML = '';
      
      let filteredAgents = agents.filter(agent => {
        const name = agent.name.toLowerCase();
        const category = agent.category.toLowerCase();
        return name.includes(searchQuery) || category.includes(searchQuery);
      });

      filteredAgents.sort((a, b) => {
        if(sortBy === 'name') return a.name.localeCompare(b.name);
        if(sortBy === 'category') return a.category.localeCompare(b.category);
        if(sortBy === 'recent') return new Date(b.lastRun) - new Date(a.lastRun);
        if(sortBy === 'version') return b.version.localeCompare(a.version);
      });

      if(filteredAgents.length === 0){
        $('#searchResultsGrid').innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">No agents found matching your search.</div>';
        $('#searchCount').textContent = '0 agents found';
      } else {
        const categorizedResults = {};
        filteredAgents.forEach(agent => {
          if(!categorizedResults[agent.category]){
            categorizedResults[agent.category] = [];
          }
          categorizedResults[agent.category].push(agent);
        });

        Object.entries(categorizedResults).forEach(([category, categoryAgents]) => {
          const groupDiv = document.createElement('div');
          groupDiv.className = 'search-category-group';
          
          const headerDiv = document.createElement('div');
          headerDiv.className = 'search-category-header';
          headerDiv.textContent = `${category} (${categoryAgents.length})`;
          groupDiv.appendChild(headerDiv);

          const tilesDiv = document.createElement('div');
          tilesDiv.className = 'search-category-tiles';
          categoryAgents.forEach(agent => {
            tilesDiv.appendChild(tile(agent));
          });
          groupDiv.appendChild(tilesDiv);

          $('#searchResultsGrid').appendChild(groupDiv);
        });

        $('#searchCount').textContent = `${filteredAgents.length} agent${filteredAgents.length === 1 ? '' : 's'} found in ${Object.keys(categorizedResults).length} categor${Object.keys(categorizedResults).length === 1 ? 'y' : 'ies'}`;
      }
      
    } else {
      $('#sectionsContainer').classList.remove('search-active');
      $('#searchResults').classList.remove('active');
      
      Object.values(categoryMap).forEach(cat => {
        $(`#${cat}-grid`).innerHTML = '';
      });
      $('#favorites-grid').innerHTML = '';

      let sortedAgents = [...agents];
      sortedAgents.sort((a, b) => {
        if(sortBy === 'name') return a.name.localeCompare(b.name);
        if(sortBy === 'category') return a.category.localeCompare(b.category);
        if(sortBy === 'recent') return new Date(b.lastRun) - new Date(a.lastRun);
        if(sortBy === 'version') return b.version.localeCompare(a.version);
      });

      const favAgents = sortedAgents.filter(a => favSet.has(a.id));
      if(favAgents.length === 0){
        $('#favorites-grid').innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">No favorites yet. Star some agents to see them here!</div>';
      } else {
        favAgents.forEach(agent => {
          $('#favorites-grid').appendChild(tile(agent));
        });
      }
      $('#fav-count').textContent = favAgents.length;

      Object.entries(categoryMap).forEach(([catName, catId]) => {
        const catAgents = sortedAgents.filter(a => a.category === catName);
        const grid = $(`#${catId}-grid`);
        
        if(catAgents.length === 0){
          grid.innerHTML = '<div class="empty-section">No agents in this category</div>';
        } else {
          catAgents.forEach(agent => {
            grid.appendChild(tile(agent));
          });
        }
        
        $(`#${catId}-count`).textContent = catAgents.length;
      });
    }
  }

  $$('.section-header').forEach(header => {
    header.addEventListener('click', () => {
      header.classList.toggle('collapsed');
      header.nextElementSibling.classList.toggle('collapsed');
    });
  });

  $('#searchInput').addEventListener('input', (e) => {
    searchQuery = e.target.value.toLowerCase();
    renderAll();
  });

  $('#sortSelect').addEventListener('change', (e) => {
    sortBy = e.target.value;
    renderAll();
  });

  loadData();
</script>

</body></html>

  *{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}
  html,body{height:100%;overflow:hidden;width:100%}
  body{
    background:var(--bg);
    color:var(--text);
    font-family: "Avenir", "Avenir Next", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    font-weight: 400;
    letter-spacing: 0.00938em;
    -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;
    transition:background .3s ease, color .3s ease;
  }

  /* Material Design 2 Typography Scale */
  .text-h1 { font-size: 6rem; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.167; letter-spacing: -0.01562em; }
  .text-h2 { font-size: 3.75rem; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.2; letter-spacing: -0.00833em; }
  .text-h3 { font-size: 3rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.167; letter-spacing: 0em; }
  .text-h4 { font-size: 2.125rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.235; letter-spacing: 0.00735em; }
  .text-h5 { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.334; letter-spacing: 0em; }
  .text-h6 { font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.6; letter-spacing: 0.0075em; }
  .text-subtitle1 { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.75; letter-spacing: 0.00938em; }
  .text-subtitle2 { font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.57; letter-spacing: 0.00714em; }
  .text-body1 { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 0.00938em; }
  .text-body2 { font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.43; letter-spacing: 0.01071em; }
  .text-button { font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.75; letter-spacing: 0.02857em; text-transform: uppercase; }
  .text-caption { font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 1.66; letter-spacing: 0.03333em; }
  .text-overline { font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 400; line-height: 2.66; letter-spacing: 0.08333em; text-transform: uppercase; }

  .container{
    display:flex;
    height:100vh;
    position:relative;
    min-height:100vh;
    flex-direction:column;
  }

  .main-content{
    flex:1;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    overflow:hidden;
    transition:margin-right .3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    width:100%;
  }

  .main-content.pane-open{
    margin-right:520px;
  }

  .top-bar{
    padding: 0 16px;
    background: var(--card);
    color: var(--text);
    display: flex;
    gap: 16px;
    align-items: center;
    box-shadow: var(--elevation-4);
    position: relative;
    z-index: 50;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    min-height: 64px;
    height: 64px;
  }

  .search-wrapper{
    position:relative;
    flex:1;
    max-width:600px;
    min-width:200px;
  }

  .search-icon{
    position:absolute;
    left:16px;
    top:50%;
    transform:translateY(-50%);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    pointer-events:none;
  }

  .search-input{
    width:100%;
    padding: 8px 16px 8px 48px;
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: 4px;
    color: var(--text);
    font-size: 16px;
    font-family: inherit;
    outline: none;
    transition: all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  }

  .search-input::placeholder{
    color: var(--text-muted);
  }

  .search-input:focus{
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-color: var(--primary);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(25,118,210,0.2);
  }

  .top-bar-actions{
    display:flex;
    gap:12px;
    align-items:center;
    margin-left:auto;
    flex-wrap:wrap;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .theme-toggle{
    display: none;
  }

  .theme-toggle svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
  }

  .sort-select{
    padding: 8px 32px 8px 16px;
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: 4px;
    color: var(--text);
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: inherit;
    outline: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    appearance: none;
    transition: all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width: 180px;
    background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="%239E9E9E" stroke-width="2"><path d="m6 9 6 6 6-6"/></svg>');
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: right 12px center;
  }

  .sort-select:hover, .sort-select:focus{
    background: var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-color: var(--primary);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(25,118,210,0.2);
  }

  .sort-select:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .sort-select option{
    background:var(--card);
    color:var(--text);
  }

  .sections-container{
    flex:1;
    overflow-y:auto;
    overflow-x:hidden;
    padding:28px 32px;
  }

  .search-results-container{
    display:none;
  }

  .search-results-container.active{
    display:block;
  }

  .sections-container.search-active .category-section{
    display:none;
  }

  .search-results-grid{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:32px;
  }

  .search-category-group{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:16px;
  }

  .search-category-header{
    font-size:clamp(14px, 2.2vw, 16px);
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--text);
    padding:12px 0;
    border-bottom:2px solid var(--accent);
    letter-spacing:.3px;
  }

  .search-category-tiles{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(340px,1fr));
    gap:20px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for search category tiles */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .search-category-tiles{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:20px;
    }
    .search-category-tiles .card{
      flex:1 1 340px;
      max-width:calc(50% - 10px);
    }
  }

  .search-header{
    margin-bottom:24px;
    padding-bottom:16px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .search-header h2{
    font-size:clamp(16px, 2.5vw, 18px);
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:700;
  }

  .search-header .count{
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:clamp(12px, 1.8vw, 14px);
    margin-top:6px;
  }

  .category-section{
    margin-bottom:28px;
    overflow:visible;
  }

  .section-header{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    justify-content:space-between;
    padding:16px 20px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    user-select:none;
    margin-bottom:16px;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    min-height:44px;
  }

  .section-header:hover{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .section-header:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .section-title{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .section-title h2{
    font-size:clamp(14px, 2.2vw, 16px);
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--text);
  }

  .section-count{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    padding:4px 10px;
    border-radius:12px;
    font-size:clamp(10px, 1.5vw, 12px);
    font-weight:700;
    color:var(--accent);
    border:1px solid var(--accent-border);
  }

  .toggle-icon{
    transition:transform .3s;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:18px;
  }

  .section-header.collapsed .toggle-icon{
    transform:rotate(-90deg);
  }

  .section-grid{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(340px,1fr));
    gap:20px;
    max-height:2000px;
    overflow:visible;
    transition:max-height .3s ease, opacity .3s ease;
    opacity:1;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for older browsers */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .section-grid{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:20px;
    }
    .section-grid .card{
      flex:1 1 340px;
      max-width:calc(50% - 10px);
    }
  }

  .section-grid.collapsed{
    max-height:0;
    opacity:0;
  }

  .card{
    position:relative;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:20px;
    padding:16px;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    cursor:pointer;
    overflow:visible;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    min-height:200px;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    width:100%;
    max-width:100%;
  }
  
  .card:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-8);
    transform:translateY(-2px);
  }

  .card:active{
    transform:translateY(0);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .card:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .card.hidden{display:none}

  .fav{
    position:absolute;
    top:8px;
    right:8px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:50%;
    padding:8px;
    cursor:pointer;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    z-index:10;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
  }
  
  .fav:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .fav:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }
  
  .fav svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
    fill:none;
    stroke:currentColor;
    stroke-width:2.5;
    transition:all .2s;
  }
  
  .fav.active{
    color:var(--primary);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }
  
  .fav.active svg{
    fill:var(--primary);
    stroke:var(--primary);
  }

  .head{
    display:flex;
    align-items:flex-start;
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:16px;
    padding-right:40px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .icon-wrap{
    width:48px;
    height:48px;
    border-radius:4px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .icon-wrap svg{
    width:24px;
    height:24px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    stroke-width:2;
    stroke-linecap:round;
    stroke-linejoin:round;
    fill:none;
  }

  .title-area{
    min-width:0;
    flex:1;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .name{
    font-size:clamp(14px, 2.2vw, 16px);
    font-weight:600;
    margin:0 0 6px;
    color:var(--text);
    line-height:1.4;
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .badge{
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:12px;
    padding:4px 8px;
    border-radius:16px;
    color:white;
    background:#6200EE;
    font-weight:500;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
  }

  .meta{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-top:auto;
    padding-top:16px;
    border-top:1px solid var(--border);
    font-size:clamp(10px, 1.6vw, 12px);
    flex-shrink:0;
    min-width:0;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for meta grid */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .meta{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .meta .kv{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:120px;
    }
    .meta .state-indicator{
      flex:1 1 100%;
    }
  }

  .kv{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:4px;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .kv.desc{ grid-column:1/-1 }

  .k{
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-size:clamp(8px, 1.2vw, 10px);
    font-weight:600;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
  }

  .v{
    color:var(--text);
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .v.desc-truncate{ overflow:hidden; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap }

  .state-indicator{
    grid-column:1/-1;
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:8px;
    padding:8px 12px;
    background:var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-radius:4px;
    font-size:12px;
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .dot{
    width:6px;
    height:6px;
    border-radius:50%;
    background:var(--green);
  }

  .state-indicator.disabled{
    color:var(--red);
  }

  .state-indicator.disabled .dot{
    background:var(--red);
  }

  .state-indicator:not(.disabled){
    color:var(--green);
  }

  .empty-section{
    text-align:center;
    padding:40px 20px;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
  }

  .side-pane{
    position:fixed;
    top:0;
    right:-520px;
    width:520px;
    max-width:100vw;
    height:100vh;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-16);
    overflow-y:auto;
    transition:right .3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    z-index:100;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .side-pane.open{
    right:0;
  }

  .pane-header{
    position:sticky;
    top:0;
    background:var(--card);
    padding:24px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
    display:flex;
    align-items:flex-start;
    gap:16px;
    z-index:10;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    flex-shrink:0;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .close-btn{
    background:transparent;
    border:none;
    border-radius:50%;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    cursor:pointer;
    padding:8px;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    margin-left:auto;
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
  }

  .close-btn:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .close-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .close-btn svg{
    width:20px;
    height:20px;
  }

  .pane-content{
    padding:24px;
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow-y:auto;
  }

  .detail-section{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .detail-title{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    font-weight:700;
    letter-spacing:1px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:12px;
  }

  .detail-value{
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    line-height:1.6;
  }

  .detail-grid{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for detail grid */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .detail-grid{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .detail-grid .detail-item{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:200px;
    }
  }

  .detail-item{
    background:var(--card);
    padding:16px;
    border-radius:4px;
    border:none;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .detail-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .detail-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .detail-item-label{
    font-size:clamp(8px, 1.2vw, 10px);
    font-weight:600;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:6px;
  }

  .detail-item-value{
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:600;
  }

  .pane-icon{
    width:64px;
    height:64px;
    border-radius:4px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .pane-icon svg{
    width:32px;
    height:32px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    stroke-width:2;
    stroke-linecap:round;
    stroke-linejoin:round;
    fill:none;
  }

  .pane-title-area{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .pane-title-area h2{
    font-size:clamp(16px, 2.8vw, 20px);
    margin:0 0 10px;
    line-height:1.3;
    color:var(--text);
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .pane-tags{
    display:flex;
    flex-wrap:wrap;
    gap:6px;
    margin-top:0;
  }

  .pane-tag{
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:12px;
    padding:4px 8px;
    border-radius:16px;
    background:#6200EE;
    color:white;
    font-weight:500;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
  }

  .action-buttons{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);
    gap:12px;
    margin-bottom:32px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for action buttons */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .action-buttons{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .action-buttons .action-btn{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:150px;
    }
  }

  .action-btn{
    padding:12px 24px;
    background:var(--primary);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    color:white;
    font-size:14px;
    font-weight:500;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    text-align:center;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
    min-height:44px;
  }

  .action-btn:hover{
    background:var(--cfxlinkhover);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .action-btn:active{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .action-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .tabs-wrapper{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tabs-nav-container{
    position:relative;
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tabs-nav{
    display:flex;
    gap:8px;
    overflow:hidden;
    padding-bottom:12px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
    position:relative;
  }

  .tabs-scroll{
    display:flex;
    gap:8px;
    transition:transform .3s ease;
    flex-wrap:nowrap;
    min-width:0;
  }

  .tab-btn{
    padding:12px 16px;
    background:transparent;
    border:none;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:14px;
    font-weight:500;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    white-space:nowrap;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:0.4px;
    border-radius:4px;
    position:relative;
    flex-shrink:0;
    min-width:0;
    min-height:44px;
  }

  .tab-btn:hover{
    color:var(--text);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .tab-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .tab-btn.active{
    color:var(--primary);
    background:var(--accent-light);
  }

  .tab-btn.active::after{
    content:'';
    position:absolute;
    bottom:0;
    left:0;
    right:0;
    height:2px;
    background:var(--primary);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn{
    position:absolute;
    top:50%;
    transform:translateY(-50%);
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    border-radius:50%;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    z-index:5;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn:hover{
    background:var(--accent-light);
    color:var(--primary);
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .tab-nav-btn:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.left{
    left:-8px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.right{
    right:-8px;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn.hidden{
    display:none;
  }

  .tab-nav-btn svg{
    width:16px;
    height:16px;
  }

  .tab-content{
    display:none;
    animation:fadeIn .3s ease;
  }

  .tab-content.active{
    display:block;
  }

  @keyframes fadeIn{
    from{opacity:0;transform:translateY(8px)}
    to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}
  }

  .tab-section{
    margin-bottom:24px;
  }

  .tab-section-title{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    font-weight:700;
    letter-spacing:1px;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    color:var(--text-muted);
    margin-bottom:12px;
    padding-bottom:8px;
    border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);
  }

  .tab-section-content{
    font-size:clamp(12px, 2vw, 14px);
    line-height:1.6;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .tab-section-content ul{
    list-style:none;
    padding:0;
  }

  .tab-section-content li{
    padding:6px 0;
    padding-left:18px;
    position:relative;
  }

  .tab-section-content li:before{
    content:'•';
    position:absolute;
    left:0;
    color:var(--accent);
    font-weight:bold;
  }

  .contact-grid{
    display:grid;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .contact-item{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .contact-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .contact-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .contact-icon{
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-radius:4px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .contact-icon svg{
    width:18px;
    height:18px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:2;
  }

  .contact-details{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .contact-label{
    font-size:clamp(8px, 1.2vw, 10px);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:600;
    text-transform:uppercase;
    letter-spacing:.5px;
    margin-bottom:4px;
  }

  .contact-value{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    color:var(--text);
    font-weight:500;
    word-break:break-all;
  }

  .image-gallery{
    display:grid;
    grid-template-columns:repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap:12px;
  }

  /* Flexbox fallback for image gallery */
  @supports not (display: grid) {
    .image-gallery{
      display:flex;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery .gallery-item{
      flex:1 1 calc(50% - 6px);
      min-width:150px;
    }
  }

  .gallery-item{
    aspect-ratio:16/9;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    overflow:hidden;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-2);
  }

  .gallery-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-8);
    transform:scale(1.02);
  }

  .gallery-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .gallery-placeholder{
    color:var(--text-muted);
  }

  .gallery-placeholder svg{
    width:32px;
    height:32px;
    stroke:currentColor;
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:1.5;
  }

  .video-list{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:12px;
  }

  .video-item{
    display:flex;
    gap:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .video-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .video-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .video-thumb{
    width:100px;
    height:60px;
    background:var(--cfx3rdlevel);
    border-radius:4px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .video-thumb svg{
    width:24px;
    height:24px;
    fill:var(--accent);
  }

  .video-info{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .video-title{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:4px;
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .video-duration{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:500;
  }

  .document-list{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction:column;
    gap:10px;
  }

  .document-item{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border:none;
    border-radius:4px;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    min-width:0;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .document-item:hover{
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-4);
  }

  .document-item:focus{
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary);
    outline-offset: 2px;
  }

  .document-icon{
    width:40px;
    height:40px;
    display:grid;
    place-items:center;
    background:var(--accent-light);
    border-radius:4px;
    flex-shrink:0;
  }

  .document-icon svg{
    width:18px;
    height:18px;
    stroke:var(--accent);
    fill:none;
    stroke-width:2;
  }

  .document-info{
    flex:1;
    min-width:0;
    overflow:hidden;
  }

  .document-name{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:2px;
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow-wrap:break-word;
  }

  .document-meta{
    font-size:clamp(9px, 1.4vw, 11px);
    color:var(--text-muted);
    font-weight:500;
  }
  
  a{ color:var(--accent); text-decoration:none }
  a:hover{ color:var(--accent-hover) }

  .troubleshooting-item{
    margin-bottom:16px;
    padding:16px;
    background:var(--card);
    border-left:4px solid var(--primary);
    border-radius:4px;
    box-shadow:var(--elevation-1);
  }

  .troubleshooting-question{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    font-weight:600;
    color:var(--text);
    margin-bottom:8px;
  }

  .troubleshooting-answer{
    font-size:clamp(11px, 1.8vw, 13px);
    line-height:1.6;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
  }

  .backdrop{
    position:fixed;
    top:0;
    left:0;
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    background:transparent;
    opacity:0;
    pointer-events:none;
    transition:opacity 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    z-index:99;
  }

  .backdrop.active{
    opacity:1;
    pointer-events:all;
  }

  /* Extra Large Screens (1600px+) */
  @media (min-width: 1601px){
    .section-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(380px,1fr))}
    .search-category-tiles{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(380px,1fr))}
    .container{
      max-width:1800px;
      margin:0 auto;
    }
  }

  /* Large Screens (1201px - 1600px) */
  @media (min-width: 1201px) and (max-width: 1600px){
    .backdrop{
      display:none;
    }
    .section-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(320px,1fr))}
    .search-category-tiles{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(320px,1fr))}
  }

  /* Desktop Screens (1025px - 1200px) */
  @media (min-width: 1025px) and (max-width: 1200px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }

      width:100%;

    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .section-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(300px,1fr))}
    .search-category-tiles{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(300px,1fr))}
  }

  /* Tablet Landscape (769px - 1024px) */
  @media (min-width: 769px) and (max-width: 1024px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:520px;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .top-bar{
      padding: 0 16px;

    }
    .search-wrapper{
      max-width:400px;
    }

    .section-header{
      padding:16px 18px;
    }
    .action-buttons{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .detail-grid{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:20px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:20px;
    }
  }

  /* Tablet Portrait (481px - 768px) */
  @media (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 768px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:520px;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .top-bar{
      flex-direction:column;
      align-items:stretch;
      padding: 0 16px;
      gap:12px;
      height:auto;
      min-height:64px;
    }
    .search-wrapper{
      max-width:100%;
    }
    .top-bar-actions{
      margin-left:0;
      justify-content:space-between;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
    }
    .sort-select{
      flex:1;
      min-width:150px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:20px 16px;
    }
    .section-grid, .search-category-tiles{
      grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(250px,1fr));
      gap:16px;
    }
    .card{
      padding:16px;
      min-height:180px;
    }
    .section-header{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .action-buttons{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .detail-grid{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:16px;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .pane-icon{
      width:56px;
      height:56px;
    }
    .pane-icon svg{
      width:28px;
      height:28px;
    }
    .pane-title-area h2{
      font-size:18px;
    }
    .tab-btn{
      padding:12px 16px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
  }

  /* Mobile Landscape (481px - 600px) */
  @media (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 600px){
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:100%;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:16px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:16px;
    }
  }

  /* Mobile Portrait (320px - 480px) */
  @media (max-width: 480px){
    .main-content.pane-open{
      margin-right:0;
    }
    .side-pane{
      width:100%;
      max-width:100%;
      right:-100%;
    }
    .side-pane.open{
      right:0;
    }
    .top-bar{
      padding: 0 12px;
      gap:8px;
      height:auto;
      min-height:56px;
    }
    .search-wrapper{
      max-width:100%;
    }
    .top-bar-actions{
      margin-left:0;
      justify-content:space-between;
      flex-wrap:wrap;
      gap:8px;
    }
    .sort-select{
      flex:1;
      min-width:120px;
      font-size:14px;
    }
    .theme-toggle{
      width:40px;
      height:40px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:16px 12px;
    }
    .section-grid, .search-category-tiles{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .card{
      padding:16px;
      min-height:160px;
    }
    .section-header{
      padding:12px 16px;
    }
    .section-title h2{
      font-size:14px;
    }
    .section-count{
      font-size:11px;
      padding:4px 8px;
    }
    .head{
      gap:12px;
      margin-bottom:12px;
      padding-right:40px;
    }
    .icon-wrap{
      width:40px;
      height:40px;
    }
    .icon-wrap svg{
      width:20px;
      height:20px;
    }
    .name{
      font-size:14px;
    }
    .badge{
      font-size:10px;
      padding:4px 8px;
    }
    .meta{
      gap:12px;
      padding-top:12px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .action-buttons{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
      gap:8px;
    }
    .action-btn{
      padding:12px 16px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .image-gallery{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .detail-grid{
      grid-template-columns:1fr;
    }
    .pane-header{
      padding:12px;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:12px;
    }
    .pane-icon{
      width:48px;
      height:48px;
    }
    .pane-icon svg{
      width:24px;
      height:24px;
    }
    .pane-title-area h2{
      font-size:16px;
    }
    .pane-tag{
      font-size:10px;
      padding:4px 8px;
    }
    .tab-btn{
      padding:12px 16px;
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .tab-nav-btn{
      width:32px;
      height:32px;
    }
    .tab-nav-btn svg{
      width:16px;
      height:16px;
    }
    .contact-item, .document-item, .video-item{
      padding:12px;
      gap:12px;
    }
    .contact-icon, .document-icon{
      width:36px;
      height:36px;
    }
    .contact-icon svg, .document-icon svg{
      width:18px;
      height:18px;
    }
    .video-thumb{
      width:80px;
      height:48px;
    }
    .video-thumb svg{
      width:20px;
      height:20px;
    }
    .video-title{
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .video-duration{
      font-size:10px;
    }
    .document-name{
      font-size:12px;
    }
    .document-meta{
      font-size:10px;
    }
    .contact-label{
      font-size:9px;
    }
    .contact-value{
      font-size:12px;
    }
  }

  /* Extra Small Mobile (max-width: 320px) */
  @media (max-width: 320px){
    .top-bar{
      padding: 0 8px;
    }
    .sections-container{
      padding:12px 8px;
    }
    .card{
      padding:12px;
      min-height:140px;
    }
    .section-header{
      padding:12px;
    }
    .head{
      gap:8px;
      margin-bottom:10px;
      padding-right:36px;
    }
    .icon-wrap{
      width:36px;
      height:36px;
    }
    .icon-wrap svg{
      width:18px;
      height:18px;
    }
    .name{
      font-size:13px;
    }
    .meta{
      gap:8px;
      padding-top:10px;
      font-size:11px;
    }
    .pane-header{

    }
    .pane-content{
      padding:8px;
    }
    .pane-icon{
      width:44px;
      height:44px;
    }
    .pane-icon svg{
      width:22px;
      height:22px;
    }
    .pane-title-area h2{

    }
    .tab-btn{
      padding:8px 12px;
      font-size:10px;
    }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar{width:8px;height:8px}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:var(--bg)}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:var(--border);border-radius:4px}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:var(--text-muted)}

  .gallery-item img{width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;display:block}

  .show-all-toggle{
    display:flex;
    align-items:center;
    gap:8px;
    color:var(--text-secondary);
    font-size:14px;
    user-select:none;
  }
  .show-all-toggle input{ width:16px;height:16px }

  /* === Image Modal (Lightbox) === */
#imgModal {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 9999;
  padding-top: 60px;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
}

#imgModal img {
  margin: auto;
  display: block;
  max-width: 90%;
  max-height: 85%;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 15px #000;
}

#imgModalClose {
  position: absolute;
  top: 15px;
  right: 35px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 35px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
}
/* === Agent Icon Styling === */
  .icon-wrap img {
    display: block;
    width: 32px;
    height: 32px;
    border-radius: 6px;
  }
</style>
</head>
<body>
  <div class="container">
    <div class="main-content">
      <div class="top-bar">
        <div class="search-wrapper">
          <svg class="search-icon" width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
            <circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"></circle><path d="m21 21-4.35-4.35"></path>
          </svg>
          <input type="text" class="search-input" id="searchInput" placeholder="Search agents...">
        </div>
        <div class="top-bar-actions">
          <button class="theme-toggle" id="themeToggle" title="Toggle theme">
            <svg class="sun-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" style="display: block;">
              <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="5"></circle><line x1="12" y1="1" x2="12" y2="3"></line><line x1="12" y1="21" x2="12" y2="23"></line><line x1="4.22" y1="4.22" x2="5.64" y2="5.64"></line><line x1="18.36" y1="18.36" x2="19.78" y2="19.78"></line><line x1="1" y1="12" x2="3" y2="12"></line><line x1="21" y1="12" x2="23" y2="12"></line><line x1="4.22" y1="19.78" x2="5.64" y2="18.36"></line><line x1="18.36" y1="5.64" x2="19.78" y2="4.22"></line>
            </svg>
            <svg class="moon-icon" style="display: none;" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
              <path d="M21 12.79A9 9 0 1 1 11.21 3 7 7 0 0 0 21 12.79z"></path>
            </svg>
          </button>
          <label class="show-all-toggle"><input type="checkbox" id="showAllToggle"> Show All Agents</label>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="sections-container" id="sectionsContainer">
        <div class="search-results-container" id="searchResults">
          <div class="search-header">
            <h2>Search Results</h2>
            <div class="count" id="searchCount"></div>
          </div>
          <div class="search-results-grid" id="searchResultsGrid"></div>
        </div>

        <div class="category-section" id="favorites-section">
          <div class="section-header" data-section="favorites">
            <div class="section-title">
              <h2>FAVORITES</h2>
              <span class="section-count" id="fav-count">0</span>
            </div>
            <span class="toggle-icon">▼</span>
          </div>
          <div class="section-grid" id="favorites-grid"><div class="empty-section">No favorites yet. Star some agents to see them here!</div></div>
        </div>

        <div id="categoriesContainer"></div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="backdrop" id="backdrop"></div>

    <div class="side-pane" id="sidePane">
      <div class="pane-header">
        <div class="pane-icon" id="paneIcon"></div>
        <div class="pane-title-area">
          <h2 id="paneTitle"></h2>
          <div class="pane-tags" id="paneTags"></div>
        </div>
        <button class="close-btn" id="closePane">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
            <path d="M18 6L6 18M6 6l12 12"></path>
          </svg>
        </button>
      </div>
      <div class="pane-content" id="paneContent"></div>
    </div>
  </div>

<script>
  const icons = {
